French voters are flooded with an avalanche of fake news about May's presidential election, and Germany plans to impose a fine on the social media network in advance of the September elections if it does not urgently remove angry contributions.

source: „Za vlády předchozí administrace EPA často neplnila termíny a čekala, až bude zažalována aktivistickými skupinami a ostatními, souhlasíc s urovnáním a dalším nastavením plánů,“ řekl Pruitt, který ve své předchozí pozici podal na EPA více než tucet žalob.

source: Společnosti se snaží vyhnout chybám Volkswagenu, který ve snaze splnit emisní limity instaloval do svých vozů software, který při testování snižoval množství vydávaných emisí, ale za běžných podmínek byl software deaktivován.
reference: Companies are trying to avoid the mistakes of Volkswagen, which, in an effort to meet emission limits, installed software in its cars, which in testing reduced the amount of emissions issued, but under normal conditions the software was deactivated.
translation: The companies are trying to avoid repeating the mistakes of Volkswagen, which covered up its use of so-called defeat devices that could adjust emissions to comply with regulations when a car was being tested, but ease back in normal driving conditions.

source: Horké letní dny úplně lákají k tomu, vzít si na sebe jen to nejnutnější, co zakryje ty nejintimnější partie.

source: Na cesty si musejí získat buď federální granty, je ale absurdní, aby federální vláda financovala cesty občanů ze státu A do státu B, anebo soukromý sponzoring.
reference: They have to get either federal grants to travel, but it's absurd for the federal government to fund citizens' travel from state A to state B, or private sponsorship.
translation: To fund the trips, they must either get federal grants, although it is absurd for the federal government to finance the travels of citizens from State A to State B, or else private sponsorship.

source: „Musíme dál zápasit s ideologickým tažením Trumpovy administrativy, která se snaží napomáhat znečišťovatelům a zvláštním zájmům.“
reference: "We must continue to grapple with the ideological pull of the Trump administration, which seeks to assist polluters and special interests."
translation: "We've got to keep fighting the Trump administration's ideological crusade to pander to polluters and special interests."

source: Doklady přežily celou dekádu pod vodou, bez nich by policii trvalo mnohem déle zjistit totožnost nalezených.
reference: The documents survived an entire decade underwater, without them it would take the police much longer to establish the identities of the found.
translation: The documents survived an entire decade underwater, and without them the police would have taken much longer to determine the identities of the couple found.

source: Většinou slouží do osmi až deseti let.
reference: They mostly serve within eight to 10 years.
translation: Most of them remain for around 8 to 10 years.

source: Úřad zdůraznil, že riziko představuje pouze omezený počet typů vajec rozpoznatelný podle konkrétních čísel.
reference: The Authority stressed that the risk represents only a limited number of types of eggs recognisable by specific numbers.
translation: The authority stressed that the risk only affected a limited number of egg types, meaning that a specific number can be given.

source: Před rozhodnutím banky o nejnovějších sazbách mnozí požadovali nárůst sazeb spolu se vzrůstající inflací, která vyvíjela čím dál větší tlak na domácnosti. Tři političtí činitelé požadovali v červnu zvýšení na 0,5 %.
reference: Ahead of the Bank's decision on the latest rates, many have called for a rise in rates along with rising inflation, which has put increasing pressure on households. Three policy makers demanded an increase to 0.5% in June.
translation: Prior to the Bank's latest rates verdict, there had been growing clamour for a rate rise as inflation ramped up pressure on hard-pressed households, with three policymakers calling for an increase to 0.5% in July.

source: Britský vynálezce používá mikročip ve své ruce k odemykání auta a domu mávnutím
reference: British inventor uses microchip in his hand to unlock car and house by wave
translation: British inventor microchips himself to get into house and car with a wave of hand

source: Neymar podepsal pětiletou smlouvu, takže převod lze rozepsat na 44,4 milionů EUR každoročně po dobu pěti let.
reference: Neymar has signed a five-year contract so the transfer can be circulated at €44.4 million each year for five years.
translation: Neymar has signed a five-year deal, so the transfer fee could be shown as a 44.4 million-euro cost in the annual accounts for the next five years.

source: Dvěma lidem se bohužel před strojem utéct nepodařilo.
reference: Unfortunately, two people failed to escape from the machine.
translation: Unfortunately, two people failed to escape the plane.

source: Nikdo však nebyl dosud soudně stíhán.

translation: But not one was ever prosecuted.

source: Zvuky policejních sirén ukazují na další přestřelku.
reference: The sounds of police sirens point to another shootout.
translation: Sirens wailed nearby - another shootout in the area.

source: Prokuratura je v Polsku podřízena ministru spravedlnosti, který plní roli generálního prokurátora.
reference: The Crown Prosecution Service is subordinate in Poland to the Minister of Justice, who performs the role of Attorney General.
translation: In Poland the prosecutor's office is subordinate to the Minister of Justice, who acts as the Prosecutor General.

source: Pruitt, který před dosazením do role šéfa EPA prezidentem Donaldem Trumpem zastával pozici státního generálního prokurátora Oklahomy, dlouhou dobu sloužil jako spolehlivý odpůrce přísnějších environmentálních nařízení.
reference: Pruitt, who before reaching the role of EPA chief by President Donald Trump held the position of Oklahoma's attorney general, has long served as a reliable opponent of tougher environmental regulations.
translation: Pruitt, who was Oklahoma's state attorney general prior to his appointment by President Donald Trump, has long served as a reliable opponent of stricter environmental regulations.

source: Učitelky se s dětmi snaží chodit do lesa, kde je větší chládek.
reference: The teachers and the kids try to walk into the woods, where it's more cool.
translation: Teachers try to go into the woods with the kids, where there is a more shade.

translation: It is very popular in Western Europe, especially among younger customers.

source: A když se na trhu objeví analytický nástroj, který zajistí angažovanost a závazek zaměstnanců vůči společnosti, není divu, že se najde spousta investorů, kteří tuto snahu podpoří.
reference: And when an analytical tool appears on the market to ensure employee engagement and commitment to the company, it's no wonder there are plenty of investors who will support the effort.
translation: If third-party analytics tools promise to increase employee commitment and engagement, it's no wonder they're finding backing.

source: Řečí 21. století: služebné.
reference: The talk of the 21st century: Handmaids.
translation: Or to put it into 2017 parlance: handmaidens.

source: V pondělí byl vydán zatykač za vraždu prvního stupně na muže jménem Wyndham Lathem (42) a Andrew Warren (56) za jejich údajnou spoluúčast na smrti Trentona H. Jamese Cornell-Duranleaua, uvádí soudní spis Cook County.
reference: On Monday, a first-degree murder warrant was issued for a man named Wyndham Lathem (42) and Andrew Warren (56) for their alleged complicity in the death of Trenton H. James Cornell-Duranleau, says a Cook County court filing.
translation: On Monday, first-degree murder warrants without bail were issued for Wyndham Lathem, 42, and Andrew Warren, 56, for their alleged involvement in the death of Trenton H. James Cornell-Duranleau, Cook County court records show.

source: Často o politice mluví podobně jako Babiš, na rozdíl od něj ale nebuduje vlastní politickou značku.
reference: He often talks about politics in a similar way to Babiš, but unlike him, he doesn't build his own political brand.
translation: He often talks about politics just like Babiš, but unlike him he does not his his own political brand.

source: Až do této chvíle mohlo být na vraždy pohlíženo s odstupem, ale nyní, stojíc na stejném místě, kde došlo k lynčování, je atmosféra strašidelná.
reference: Until now, the murders may have been viewed with hindsight, but now, standing in the same place where the lynching took place, the atmosphere is eerie.
translation: Up until this point, the murders have remained an anecdote, but now, standing on the same land where the lynchings took place, the air feels haunted.

source: Převládají němečtí ovčáci, přibývá ale i ovčáků belgických.
reference: German sheepdogs are prevalent, but there are also Belgian sheepdogs.
translation: German shepherds are the dominant breed, but there are also a growing number of Belgian shepherds.

source: Počet zánětlivých buněk je vyvážen počtem buněk, jež podporují toleranci a chrání tělo, aniž by přitom poškozovaly citlivou tkáň.
reference: The number of inflammatory cells is balanced by the number of cells that promote tolerance and protect the body without damaging sensitive tissue.
translation: Cells that are capable of triggering inflammation are balanced by cells that promote tolerance, protecting the body without damaging sensitive tissues.

source: Fairfax Media kontaktovala Colina a Paula de Lutisovy a jejich právníky v pátek.
reference: Fairfax Media contacted Colin and Paul de Lutis and their lawyers on Friday.
translation: Fairfax Media contacted Colin and Paul De Lutis on Friday, and their lawyers.

source: Stát Massachusetts nemá platný zákon, který by postihoval osobu napomáhající k sebevraždě druhé osoby. Tento případ tedy zakládá právní precedens.
reference: The state of Massachusetts does not have a valid law affecting the person assisting the suicide of the other person.
translation: The case appears to set a legal precedent, as there is no Massachusetts law that criminalises telling a person to commit suicide.

source: „Pravidla FFP stále platí a jsme odhodlání je v budoucnu posílit,“ uvedl minulý týden pro Associated Press Andrea Traverso, který dohlíží na dodržování pravidel FFP.
reference: "The FFP rules still apply and we are determined to strengthen them in the future," he said last week for The Associated Press's Andrea Traverso, who oversees compliance with FFP rules.
translation: "Certainly FFP is not dead and we will, for sure, reinforce the rules going forward," Andrea Traverso, who oversees FFP at UEFA, told The Associated Press last week.

source: Proč jste stále bez angažmá?
reference: Why are you still uncommitted?
translation: Why is it that you still don't have a position?

source: Zatím tedy z D11 sjíždíme nedaleko vesnice s výmluvným názvem Pohřebačka.
reference: So far, we are coming down from D11 near the village with the eloquent name of the Cup.
translation: Meanwhile, not far from D11 we come across the village with the expressive name of Pohřebačka.

source: Společnost, která minulý měsíc odsouhlasila prodej svého podílu v Penguin Random House společnosti Bertelsmann, uvedla, že výhled na letošní rok zůstal beze změn poté, co ohlásila jednoprocentní nárůst základních prodejů v první polovině roku na 2,05 miliard liber.
reference: The company, which last month agreed to sell its stake in Penguin Random House to Bertelsmann, said the outlook for this year remained unchanged after it reported a one per cent rise in underlying sales in the first half of the year to £2.05 billion.
translation: The company, which agreed to sell its stake in Penguin Random House to partner Bertelsmann last month, said its outlook for the year was unchanged after it reported a 1 per cent rise in underlying sales in the first half to 2.05 billion pounds.

source: Banka Anglie podrží úrokovou sazbu na 0,25 %
reference: Bank of England retains interest rate to 0.25%
translation: Bank of England to keep interest rates at 0.25%

source: „Nastala panika, měli jsme strach z odplaty,“ uvedl pro TIME 29letý Dominggu Badii, který žije poblíž nemocnice a byl svědkem příjezdu zraněných.
reference: "There was panic, we were afraid of retribution," said 29-year-old Dominggu Badii, who lives near the hospital and witnessed the arrival of the injured.
translation: "We were so panicked, we are afraid there will be revenge," 29-year-old Dominggu Badii, who lives near the hospital and witnessed the injured being hurried in, tells TIME.

source: Facebook plánuje důkladnější kontrolu faktů, aby omezil počet falešných zpráv
reference: Facebook plans more thorough fact-checking to limit number of fake news

translation: The cause of the outbreak is not yet known.

source: Čtvrtý odsouzený, kterému je 38 let, tak může učinit už po 15 letech za mřížemi.

translation: The fourth convict is 38 years old, and can make the request after 15 years behind bars.

source: Chceme jen zkrácení doby jízdy a chceme dostat kamióny jedoucí do Polska nebo z Polska z vesnic a měst.
reference: We just want to reduce the driving time and we want to get trucks going to or from Poland from villages and towns.
translation: We just want to shorten driving times and to divert trucks going to or from Poland away from villages and towns.

source: Dr. Cervantes-Barraganová vysvětlila, že lidé mají stejné tolerantní buňky jako myši a většina z nás uchovává bakterie L. reuteri ve svém gastrointestinálním traktu.
reference: Dr. Cervantes-Barragan explained that humans have the same tolerant cells as mice, and most of us store L. reuteri bacteria in their gastrointestinal tract.
translation: Dr Cervantes-Barragan explained people have the same tolerance-promoting cells as mice, and most of us shelter L. reuteri in our gastrointestinal tracts.

source: Moment, moment, o tomhle se bavíte u oběda, říkáte si?

translation: One second, are you asking yourselves, “is this what you talk about over lunch?”

source: Další z anonymních obyvatelů k tomu řekl: ‚Je to směšné. Zrovna nedávno jsme sledovali poslední odjíždějící turisty a teď jsou zpět.
reference: Another of the anonymous residents said: 'It's ridiculous - we just recently watched the last departing tourists and now they're back.
translation: One local resident who did not wish to be named said: 'It is ridiculous, we have only just seen the last round of these travellers leaving, only to be blighted by another round.

source: Třetiligový hráč začal podle svých slov brát steroidy rok předtím, když propadl kulturistice.

translation: The third league player apparently began to take steroids a year earlier, when he got addicted to bodybuilding.

source: Jak chutná Moravskoslezsko?

translation: How does the Moravian-Silesian region taste?

source: Celkem jich bylo 420.

translation: The overall total was 420.

source: FFP zavedl Michel Platini po dosazení do křesla ředitele UEFA v roce 2007.
reference: FFP was introduced by Michel Platini after reaching the UEFA director's chair in 2007.
translation: FFP was conceived by Michel Platini after his election as UEFA president in 2007.

source: Když oficiální delegace z Nizozemska, v čele s vyslancem pro lidská práva Keesem Van Baarem, navštívila 4. května Jayapurau, místní lidé provolávali podle zdroje, který se také zúčastnil zasedání, ale chtěl zůstat v anonymitě, heslo „chceme svobodu“.
reference: When an official delegation from the Netherlands, headed by human rights envoy Keesem Van Baar, visited Jayapurau on May 4, local people chanted, according to a source who also attended the meeting but wanted to remain anonymous, the motto "we want freedom."
translation: When an official delegation from the Netherlands, headed by the nation's human rights ambassador Kees Van Baar, visited Jayapura on May 4, local people broke their silence, beseeching, "We want freedom," according to a source who also attended the meeting but who asked to stay anonymous.

source: A novináři jsou pronásledováni a zabíjeni, jako např. v případě Rubena Espinosa, který byl zavražděn v roce 2015 spolu se čtyřmi ženami v bytě v Mexico City, tři měsíce po útěku z Veracruze.
reference: And journalists are persecuted and killed, such as in the case of Ruben Espinosa, who was murdered in 2015 along with four women in an apartment in Mexico City, three months after fleeing Veracruz.
translation: And sometimes, they are hunted down, as apparently was photographer Ruben Espinosa, who was murdered in 2015 along with four women in a Mexico City apartment three months after fleeing Veracruz.

source: V Dubaji se v pátek ocitl v plamenech jeden z největších obytných mrakodrapů světa. Hasiči museli evakuovat všechny obyvatele 337 metrů vysoké a 79 patrové budovy.
reference: In Dubai, one of the world's largest residential skyscrapers went up in flames on Friday; firefighters had to evacuate all residents of the 337-metre-high and 79-storey building.
translation: A fire ripped through one of the world's tallest residential towers in Dubai on Friday, forcing hundreds of occupants to flee the 337 metre-tall, 79-storey structure.

source: Zdejší obyvatelé si své potraviny pěstují: hlavně sladké brambory, ovoce a listovou zeleninu.
reference: Residents here grow their food: Mainly sweet potatoes, fruit and leafy vegetables.
translation: People here grow everything they eat: mainly nota plus some fruit and leafy vegetables.

source: Při návratu z věznice, zrovna před vjezdem na most Moore's Ford, jim cestu zahradila skupina podezřelých.
reference: On their return from the prison, just before entering Moore's Ford Bridge, a group of suspects played their way.
translation: But, driving away from the jail, as they approached Moore's Ford Bridge, a lynch mob surrounded the car.

source: Společnost uvedla, že prováděla výzkum mezi cestujícími po celém světě, aby zjistila, kolik z nich náhodně proneslo nepovolené předměty přes letištní kontrolu a kolik tak učinilo schválně.
reference: The company said it had been conducting research among passengers around the world to see how many of them accidentally leaked unauthorized items through airport control and how much it did on purpose.
translation: The company said it surveyed travellers around the country to find out how many had accidentally brought contraband through airport security and how many had done so on purpose.

source: Byl by ideální, ale těžko se to prosadí.
reference: It would be ideal, but it's hard to get through.
translation: It would be ideal, but it is difficult to enforce.

source: Na Kolínsku hořelo pole.

translation: Fire breaks out in Kolín.

reference: "Police have information about their whereabouts and efforts to track down the suspects are escalating," Guglielmi said.
translation: "Police have an idea of their whereabouts but our efforts to locate that are intensifying," Guglielmi said.

source: Pár byl naposledy spatřen, když si Žirnov od svého otce vypůjčil auto, aby mohl vyzvednout svou přítelkyni z práce.
reference: The couple were last seen when Žirnov borrowed a car from his father so he could pick up his girlfriend from work.
translation: The couple was last seen when Zhirnov borrowed his father's car to pick his girlfriend up from work.

source: Je výsledkem dvouleté korespondence mezi Dewey-Hagborgovou, která kombinuje své zkušenosti s technologiemi, informatikou a uměním, a Manningovou - transsexuálkou a průkopnickou disidentkou, jejíž trest snížil Obama tři dny před svým odchodem z postu prezidenta USA.
reference: It is the result of a two-year correspondence between Dewey-Hagborg, who combines his experiences with technology, informatics and art, and Manning - a transgender and pioneering dissident whose punishment was reduced by Obama three days before his departure from the post of US president.
translation: It's the product of two years of correspondence between Dewey-Hagborg, whose discipline combines her expertise in technology, computer science and art, and Manning, a trans woman and pioneering dissident whose sentence was commuted by Barack Obama when he had just three days left in office.

source: „Nejsou mrtví,“ utrousí malý chlapec.
reference: "They're not dead," the little boy says.
translation: "They're not really dead," one little boy mutters, as if to remind himself.

source: V tomto případě nechal Varšavu na holičkách i maďarský premiér Viktor Orbán.
reference: In this case, Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orbán also left Warsaw.
translation: In that instance Hungarian premiere Viktor Orban also left Warsaw stranded.

source: Zároveň je to však indonéská země zlata.
reference: At the same time, however, it is the Indonesian country of gold.
translation: But it is also Indonesia's land of gold.

translation: In 2013, the Central Bohemian Region was included as well.

source: Hruška ihned zavětřil šanci.
reference: The pear immediately sniffed the chance.
translation: Hruška immediately grabbed his chance.

source: Afghánská nezávislá volební komise uvedla, že z celkových 3,6 milionu registrovaných voličů tvoří 1,2 milionu ženy.
reference: The Afghan Independent Electoral Commission said that of the total 3.6 million registered voters, 1.2 million are women.
translation: The Afghan Independent Election Commission reports 1.2 million women are registered out of 3.6 million total registered voters.

source: Před několika lety by se nad podobným výrokem těžko kdo pozastavil.
reference: A few years ago, a similar anniversary would have been hard to stop.
translation: A few years ago, it would have been very hard for someone to take exception to such a statement.

source: Paul chtěl rodinný byznys opustit již v roce 2014, ale ostrý spor je neustále propírán před nejvyšším soudem.
reference: Paul wanted to leave the family business as early as 2014, but the sharp dispute is constantly being profiled before the Supreme Court.
translation: Paul has wanted out of the family business since 2014 but an acrimonious argument is playing out in the Supreme Court over the break-up.

source: Společnost Ruby Tuesday získává velmi důležitý pohled na své zaměstnance a doufá, že z dlouhodobého hlediska tím dosáhne vysoké zaměstnanosti v oboru, který je znám častým propouštěním.
reference: Ruby Tuesday takes a very important view of its employees and hopes that in the long term it will achieve high employment in a field that is known for frequent redundancies.
translation: Over at Ruby Tuesday, the company is getting new insight on its employees, and it's hoping that in the long run, this will convert to better retention of workers in an industry known for high turnover.

source: „Colinův návrh vyzněl v mých očích výrazně v jeho prospěch,“ napsal Paul v místopřísežném prohlášení u soudu v roce 2015.
reference: "Colin's proposal sounded significantly in his favor in my eyes," Paul wrote in an affidavit filed in court in 2015.
translation: "The splits proposed by Colin left him with what I considered to be the best properties," he wrote in an initial court affidavit in 2015.

source: Podle dubajské civilní obrany se podařilo obyvatele osmdesátipatrové budovy evakuovat včas a nikdo nebyl zraněn.
reference: According to the dubai Civil Defense, residents of the 80-storey building managed to evacuate in time and no one was injured.
translation: According to the Dubai civil defences, the inhabitants of the eighty-story building were evacuated in time and no one was injured.

source: Jeden z novinářů vyčetl z veřejných záznamů, že uvedená restaurace byla registrována pod jménem, jež je spojováno s jistým politikem, který je členem Institucionální revoluční strany (PRI), ovládající všechny úrovně politické scény téměř celé minulé století.
reference: One of the journalists read from public records that the restaurant was registered under a name associated with a certain politician who is a member of the Institutional Revolutionary Party (PRI), controlling all levels of the political scene for almost the whole of the last century.
translation: A reporter learned from public records that the restaurant was registered under the name of a politician belonging to the ruling Institutional Revolution Party, or PRI, which dominated all levels of politics for nearly all of the last century.

source: Pokud se jeho zaměstnancům podařilo udržet ho alespoň několikrát na uzdě, pak jejich snaha nevyšla vniveč.
reference: If his staff managed to keep him at bay at least a few times, then their efforts did not go to waste.
translation: If his staffers managed to him out of trouble even a few times, then their efforts were worthwhile.

source: Zatím si celé roky dělal, co chtěl, a to díky provizím pro tradiční politické strany.
reference: So far, he's been doing what he wanted for years, thanks to commissions for traditional political parties.
translation: Meanwhile, he has been doing what he wants for years, thanks to kickbacks for traditional political parties.

source: Patří mezi ně Acrocanthosaurus, 11,5 metru dlouhé monstrum s váhou přes 6 tun.
reference: They include the Acrocanthosaurus, an 11.5-metre-long monster weighing over 6 tons.
translation: They include Acrocanthosaurus, a 38ft (11.5m) long monster weighing six tonnes.

source: To se ale Pekingu nedaří.
reference: But that is not going well for Beijing.
translation: It isn't doing anything for Beijing, however.

source: Bývalý vynikající sportovec Sebastian Coe pochválil ve čtvrtek Rusko za upřímnou omluvu za dopingový skandál, ale znovu opakoval, že dosud nenastal pravý čas na návrat Ruska do sportovního světa.
reference: Former outstanding athlete Sebastian Coe praised Russia on Thursday for a sincere apology for the doping scandal, but reiterated that it was not yet the right time for Russia's return to the sporting world.
translation: Global athletics boss Sebastian Coe praised what he described as a candid apology from Russia over a doping scandal on Thursday but reiterated it was not the moment for the country to be readmitted to the sport.

source: Guglielmi k tomu dodal, že v pátrání po podezřelých pomáhají policii místní, regionální a celonárodní úřady.
reference: Guglielmi added that local, regional and nationwide authorities are assisting police in the search for suspects.
translation: Guglielmi said local, regional and national authorities are helping find the suspects.

source: Jejich tvůrci je konstruují tak, aby byly příjemné na dotek a působily na první pohled jako opravdová žena.
reference: Their creators construct them to be pleasant to the touch and act at first glance like a real woman.
translation: Their creators want them to feel human to the touch, for them to mimic the movement of a real body.

source: Čímž neříkám, že to dělali dobře.
reference: So I'm not saying they did it well.

Minimálně šest procent cestujících vstoupilo na palubu letadla s nožem nebo jiným ostrým předmětem.

source: Když si k dopisu přičichnu teď, o 300 let později, je to, jako bych se vrátil v čase.

translation: To someone 300 years in the future, the smell makes it feel like they're there, too.

source: Koaliční záležitosti jako ČEB nebo EGAP nefungovaly.

source: Po inkasovaném gólu bylo třeba čtyři vstřelit, což pro nás bylo těžké.

source: Haysom uvedl, že silná role žen posílí demokracii Afghánistánu.

translation: Haysom said a strong role for women will add to Afghanistan's democratic success.

source: Zraněno bylo pět vojáků a tlumočník, uvádí se ve vyjádření NATO.

source: Seriál „First Day of Camp“ fungoval překvapivě dobře - nejen díky absurdnímu humoru (příkladem může být příběh o vzniku mluvící plechovky se zeleninou, kterou namluvil H. Jon Benjamin).
reference: The series "First Day of Camp" worked surprisingly well - not just because of its absurd humor (an example might be the story of the creation of a talking can of vegetables by H. Jon Benjamin).
translation: "First Day of Camp" worked surprisingly well, not just because of its absurdist humor (it included an origin story for a talking can of vegetables, voiced by H. Jon Benjamin).

source: Násilí neustává a těla se vrší na hromadu napříč celou zemí; novinářů mezi nimi neustále přibývá: podle Výboru na ochranu novinářů je jich alespoň 25 od nástupu prezidenta Enrique Pena Nieta k moci v prosinci 2012; 589 novinářů je pod federální ochranou po útocích a hrozbách; a ve všech sedmi státech jich bylo letos zabito sedm.
reference: Violence continues and bodies pile up across the country; journalists continue to arrive among them: according to the Committee to Protect Journalists, there are at least 25 since President Enrique Pena Nieto came to power in December 2012; 589 journalists are under federal protection following attacks and threats; and seven have been killed this year in all seven states.
translation: There is no respite from the violence, and as bodies pile up across the country, more and more of them are journalists: at least 25 since President Enrique Pena Nieto took office in December 2012, according to the Committee to Protect Journalists; 589 under federal protection after attacks and threats; and so far this year, at least seven dead in seven states.

source: Goldmacher k tomu dodal, že tehdejší náčelník štábu Reince Priebus a tajemník Bílého Domu Rob Porter „se snažili implementovat systém ke správě a dokumentaci informací, které prezident Trump obdrží“.
reference: Goldmacher added that then-Chief of Staff Reince Priebus and White House Secretary Rob Porter "sought to implement a system to manage and document the information that President Trump receives."
translation: Goldmacher added that then-chief of staff Reince Priebus and White House staff secretary Rob Porter "have tried to implement a system to manage and document the paperwork Trump receives."

source: Úředníci mu udělili ve všech kvalitativních kritériích sto procent bodů.

source: Dnes se mnozí členové této komunity řídí pravidlem žij a nech žít, jímž by se měli řídit všichni rozumní lidé, ale někteří aktivisté usilují nikoli o toleranci vůči sobě i ostatním, nýbrž o extrémní netoleranci vůči druhým.
reference: Today, many members of this community follow the live-and-let-live rule that all reasonable people should follow, but some activists seek not tolerance for themselves and others, but extreme intolerance of others.
translation: Today, many members of this community are guided by the rule of live and let live, which all reasonable people ought to follow, but some activists strive not for tolerance towards themselves and others, but for extreme intolerance towards others.

translation: Even though the state has a majority in ČEZ, it never directed it. It just served as a makeweight, which is wrong.

source: V Japonsku jsou naprosto normální pro muže, a naopak jsou tabu pro ženy." Jen pro zajímavost - to, co japonská značka Tenga, jež je v butiku Intimity zastoupená, prodá celosvětově, tvoří stále zhruba polovinu toho, co se prodá jen v Japonsku.

translation: In Japan, they're absolutely normal for men, but they're taboo for women. Out of interest, of the products by the Japanese brand Tenga worldwide, which can be found in the Intimity boutique, about half is sold in Japan.

translation: And yet she was still missing.

source: Záznamy jednotky uvádějí čas 30 minut ze základny Marine Corps Air Facility Quantico ve Virginii a zpět.

translation: Unit records record the aircraft flight time as 30 minutes each way from its home base at Marine Corps Air Facility Quantico in Virginia.

source: Anglická Národní zdravotní služba (NSH) oznámila, že pilulka pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP), která se užívá před sexem a snižuje riziko infekce u vysoce rizikových pacientů až o 86 procent, bude nabídnuta prostřednictvím zdravotní služby přibližně 10 000 pacientům v rámci tříleté zkušební doby.
reference: England's National Health Service (NSH) has announced that the pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) pill, which is taken before sex and reduces the risk of infection in high-risk patients by up to 86 per cent, will be offered through a health service to around 10,000 patients as part of a three-year trial period.
translation: NHS England announced that pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP), a pill taken before sex which has been shown to reduce the risk of infection in high-risk individuals by around 86 per cent, will now be provided by the health service through an initial three-year trial to an estimated 10,000 people.

translation: Trump drew scrutiny in February when the presidential airplane taxied to the backdrop of his first campaign rally in Melbourne, Fla., and his Twitter account is flush with messages complaining about his predecessor's use of the presidential aircraft.

translation: Over time, economic inequalities have grown between the native Papuans and the new migrants, who have arrived in greater numbers since the opening of a new air routes to Nabire Airport.

source: Přijde si pro něco hezkého, kvalitnějšího, čím by si doplnila partnerský život, nebo sama pro sebe." O to, aby se vrátila, se Martin Ráž se svým obchodním partnerem Zdeňkem Šebelkou starají tak, že se u každého produktu přesvědčují, zda je dokonale funkční.

translation: They come for something nice and high quality, either for a fulfilling life with partner or just for themselves. To ensure that these customers keep coming back, Martin Ráž and his business partner Zdeňek Šebelka take care to check every product to make sure it's actually functional.

source: 31. května zabil velký výbuch v centru města více než 150 lidí. Jedná se o nejsmrtelnější militantní útok v zemi od té doby, co americké jednotky svrhly vládu Tálibánu v roce 2001.

translation: On 31 May, a huge bombing in the centre of the city killed more than 150 people, the deadliest militant attack in the country since US-led forces ousted the Taliban from power in 2001.

translation: States have the right to enforce conscientious objection laws, as well as to decide what their money can be spent on and what it cannot.

source: Několik minut před sebevraždou mu napsala: „Musíš to udělat Conrade“ a „Stačí jen nahodit generátor a budeš svobodný a šťastný“.

translation: In the moments before his suicide, she wrote: "You need to do it, Conrad" and "All you have to do is turn the generator on and you will be free and happy."

translation: Half-jokingly, some of the reporters wondered whether these officers are among the 50 percent of cops whom the governor himself has said are not trustworthy.

source: Více než tři procenta respondentů vědomě proneslo přes ostrahu ostrý předmět, zatímco 2,2 procenta dotázaných žen a 3,7 procenta dotázaných mužů rovněž přiznalo, že úmyslně pronesli na palubu letadla zakázané drogy.
reference: More than three per cent of respondents knowingly said a sharp object through security, while 2.2 per cent of women surveyed and 3.7 per cent of men surveyed also admitted to deliberately bringing prohibited drugs on board an aircraft.
translation: More than 3 per cent admitted knowingly carrying bladed items past security, while 2.2 per cent of female respondents and 3.7 per cent of male respondents also acknowledged intentionally carrying prohibited drugs onto the aircraft.

source: Podle slov bývalého profesora robotiky a umělé inteligence na Sheffieldské univerzitě a spoluzakladatele FRR Noela Sharkeyho je nutné pohlížet na vzestup sexuálních robotů vážně.

translation: According to Noel Sharkey, emeritus professor of robotics and artificial intelligence at the University of Sheffield and co-founder of the FRR, we need to start taking their rise seriously.

source: Odvedla opravdu obrovský kus práce tím, že v rámci České republiky i v zahraničí odprezentovala přesně to, co se snažíme prezentovat my - že se erotické pomůcky dají dělat jinak, hezky, s příběhem.
reference: She has done a really huge job of presenting, within the Czech Republic and abroad, exactly what we are trying to present - that erotic devices can be done differently, nicely, with a story.
translation: She did a really great job by presenting exactly what we are trying to present in the Czech Republic and abroad - that erotic aids can be made differently and nicely, with a story.

source: Není to však první Rhodesova kniha inspirovaná archivy: je rovněž autorem Dead Men's Teeth and Other Stories (2014), kolekce inspirované dokumenty Britské knihovny - projektu, který pro něj byl velmi emocionální.
reference: But this is not Rhodes' first book inspired by the archives: he is also the author of Dead Men's Teeth and Other Stories (2014), a collection inspired by British Library documents - a project that was very emotional for him.
translation: It is not Rhodes's first book based on an archive: he also wrote 2014's Dead Men's Teeth and Other Stories, a collection inspired by documents in the British Library - a project he found unexpectedly emotional.

source: Kliniky určí způsobilé účastníky, kteří podepíší souhlas s účastí na testování, včetně mužů, žen, transsexuálních lidí a jedinců s partnerem, jehož HIV status není dosud kontrolován příslušnou léčbou.

translation: Clinics will identify eligible participants who consent to the trial, including men, women, transgender people, and individuals who have a partner whose HIV status is not known to be controlled by anti-retroviral treatment.

source: Tento měsíc zasáhl Afghánistán bombový útok - v úterý bylo zabito více než 30 lidí při výbuchu v herátské mešitě.

translation: The bombing is the latest violence to have hit Afghanistan this month - on Tuesday more than 30 people were killed in a mosque blast in Herat.

source: "Aby nepřišli alespoň o toto spojení, domluvili se s ní, že bude nahlas odpočítávat," řekla mluvčí.

source: Eric Chaisse, odborník zemědělského výzkumného ústavu CRIEPPAM v Provence uvedl: „Pěstování levandulí v Provence je ohroženo, protože v posledních několika letech byla tato rostlina vystavena změnám klimatu, které s sebou přináší méně srážek na jaře a na podzim.
reference: Eric Chaisse, an expert at the agricultural research institute CRIEPPAM in Provence said: "Lavender growing in Provence is under threat because over the last few years the plant has been exposed to climate changes, with less rainfall in spring and autumn.
translation: Eric Chaisse, an expert at the Provence-based agricultural research institute CRIEPPAM, said: "Lavender in Provence is effectively endangered, because in recent years the plant has been subjected to the effects of climate change that brought a lot less rain in the spring and mostly in the autumn.

source: Sebevražedný atentátník zaútočil na vojenský konvoj v hlavním městě Afghánistánu Kábulu. Při útoku zemřel jeden voják NATO a několik dalších bylo zraněno, uvedli oficiální představitelé.

translation: A suicide bomber has attacked a military convoy in the Afghan capital, Kabul, killing a Nato soldier and wounding several others, officials say.

source: Když policie prohledávala sklep jeho domu, objevila důkazy toho, že muž svůj čin plánoval.
reference: When police searched the basement of his home, they discovered evidence that the man had planned his actions.
translation: When the police searched the cellar of his house, they found evidence that the man had planned his actions.

source: Politické hnutí Agrofert, jak projekt Andreje Babiše nechtě pojmenoval kroměřížský starosta Jaroslav Němec, je kapitola sama pro sebe.
reference: The Agrofert political movement, as Andrej Babiš's project was inadvertently named by the Croatian mayor Jaroslav Němec, is a chapter unto itself.
translation: The Agrofert political movement, as the project by Andrej Babiš unintentionally named by the Mayor of Kroměříž Jaroslav Němec, deserves a whole chapter for itself.

source: „Soudní dvůr veřejných mínění má zmocněné regulátory,“ řekl Patrick Quinlan, zakladatel a výkonný ředitel startupu Convercent.
reference: "The court of public opinion has empowered regulators," said Patrick Quinlan, founder and CEO of Convercent, a startup.
translation: "The court of public opinion has usurped regulators," said Patrick Quinlan, the founder and chief executive of Convercent.

source: Velkou ránu zasadil Hruška Pohlreichovi v prosinci 2004 svou první kuchařkou.
reference: The big blow was dealt by Pear to Pohlreich in December 2004 with his first cookbook.
translation: Hruška dealt a severe blow to Pohlreich in December 2004 with his first recipe.

source: ‚Zcela jistě se zapíše do dějin historie jako jeden z nejkrásnějších a nejdochovanějších druhů dinosaura - Mona Lisa dinosaurů.'
reference: 'It will most certainly go down in history as one of the most beautiful and tame species of dinosaur - the Mona Lisa dinosaurs.'
translation: 'It will go down in science history as one of the most beautiful and best preserved dinosaur specimens - the Mona Lisa of dinosaurs.'

source: Sám nevím, jak se bude můj stav vyvíjet a kdy bych mohl hrát konečně od začátku.
reference: I don't know myself how my condition is going to play out and when I can finally play from the beginning.
translation: I myself don't know how my position will develop and when I will be able to play from the beginning.

source: Mladá fronta reagovala prohlášením, podle nějž považuje za mimořádně problematické, že vydavatelství Economia zasáhlo článkem v Aktuálně.cz do soutěže, kde má svoje vlastní obchodní zájmy.
reference: The young front responded by stating that they considered it extremely problematic that the publisher Economia intervened with an article in Aktuálně.cz in a competition where it has its own business interests.
translation: Mladá fronta responded with a statement that it considers it extremely problematic for Economia publishing house to release an article on Aktuálně.cz relating to a competition concerning its own business interests.

source: My o spolupráci se stranou pana Okamury neuvažujeme, neumím si to představit.
reference: We're not considering working with Mr. Okamura's party, I can't imagine.
translation: We will not consider cooperating with Mr Okamura's party, I can not imagine it.

source: Sexuální roboti se mají pokud možno co nejvíce podobat skutečným ženám (třebaže s mírami pornoherečky).
reference: Sex robots are supposed to resemble real women as much as possible (albeit with the measurements of a porn actress).
translation: The aim behind these sex robots is to create as much of a physical likeness to actual women (albeit with porn star proportions) as technologically possible.

source: Miller pokáral Acostu slovy: „Nechci se tady pouštět do historie, ale Socha Svobody je... symbol americké svobody, který vrhá světlo na celý svět.
reference: Miller rebuked Acosta, saying, "I don't want to go into history here, but the Statue of Liberty is... a symbol of American freedom that shines a light on the world.
translation: As Miller scolded Acosta: "I don't want to get off into a whole thing about history here, but the Statue of Liberty is ... a symbol of American liberty lighting the world.

source: Premiér má zasáhnout, když se ministři chovají nehospodárně, pletou si vládu s cestovní kanceláří a za peníze státu by rádi podnikali jako Marian Jurečka, který chtěl kupovat lesy v Rumunsku a půdu v Africe.
reference: The prime minister is supposed to intervene when ministers behave wastefully, confusing the government with a travel agency, and with the state's money they would like to do business like Marian Jurecka, who wanted to buy forests in Romania and land in Africa.
translation: The prime minister has to intervene when the ministers behave wastefully, confusing the government with a travel agency and using the state coffers as a business venture, like Marian Jurečka, who wanted to buy forests in Romania and land in Africa.

source: Trumpův vztah s médii se datuje několik desetiletí zpět - a nyní, když sedí v Bílém Domě, jeho zvyk sledovat televizní zprávy je ještě silnější.
reference: Trump's relationship with the media dates back several decades - and now that he's sitting in the White House, his habit of watching TV news is even stronger.
translation: President Trump's relationship with television goes back decades - and now that he's in the White House, his TV-watching habit is still going strong.

source: Tento týden jsem podobnou zkušenost zažila v obchodě, když jsem byla při placení kreditní kartou požádána o zhodnocení mého „zážitku“ na stupnici od jedné do pěti.
reference: I had a similar experience at the store this week when I was asked to rate my "experience" on a scale of one to five when I paid with a credit card.
translation: In a department store this week, on the other hand, I was required, before swiping my credit card, to rate my transactional "experience" on a scale of one to five stars.

source: Předvést něco, kvůli čemu přijdou i příště.
reference: Demonstrate something they'll come for next time.
translation: I would like to give them a reason to come to the next one.

source: Podle nedávno publikované zprávy americké centrální banky Fed mohlo Čínu v důsledku zahraničních cest Číňanů opustit až 190 miliard dolarů, zatímco Čína v rámci prodeje měny příchozím turistům ročně získá asi 35 miliard dolarů.
reference: According to a recently published report by the US Federal Reserve, as much as $190 billion may have left China as a result of Chinese foreign travel, while China receives about $35 billion annually in currency sales to incoming tourists.
translation: According to a recently published report by the Fed (the American Federal Reserve), up to 190 billion dollars may have left China as a result of foreign trips by Chinese people, while China only gains around 35 billion dollars a year through sales of foreign currency to incoming tourists.

source: „Jsem si vědom toho, že společnost Sikorsky a stát Connecticut jsou velmi pyšní na fakt, že přispívají k obraně našeho státu, a že poskytují práci stovkám, ne-li tisícům lidí.
reference: "I am aware that Sikorsky and the state of Connecticut take great pride in the fact that they contribute to the defense of our state, and that they provide jobs for hundreds, if not thousands, of people.
translation: "And I know Sikorsky and the state of Connecticut are very proud of the fact that they contribute to our national security, that there are, I assume, hundreds if not thousands of people whose job depends on that.

source: Za trestný čin obecného ohrožení jim hrozí až 15 let vězení.
reference: They face up to 15 years in prison for the public endangerment offense.
translation: Punishment for the crime could be as much as 15 years imprisonment.

source: Zdejší týmy hledají levnější a mladší hráče ze zahraničí, Lotyši mezi ně patří.
reference: The teams here are looking for cheaper and younger players from abroad, the Latvians being one of them.
translation: Our local teams are looking for cheaper and younger players from abroad, Latvians included.

source: Cestovní doporučení obvykle vydává ministerstvo zahraničí pro zahraniční země, ale v poslední době se advokační skupiny uchýlily k těmto opatřením v odpovědi na konkrétní zákony a trendy v rámci USA.
reference: Travel recommendations are usually issued by the State Department for foreign countries, but recently advocacy groups have resorted to these measures in response to specific laws and trends within the US.
translation: Travel warnings are usually issued by the State Department for other countries, but lately, advocacy groups have resorted to the measure in response to certain laws and trends inside the US.

source: Letošní turnaj je ve správných rukou.“
reference: This year's tournament is in the right hands."
translation: This is a great showcase for this course."

source: My východočeši dostáváme dálnici po kouskách, jako když se krájí salám.
reference: We EastEnders get the highway in pieces, like a salami slicer.
translation: We Eastern Bohemians are getting our motorway in pieces, like cutting slices off a salami.

source: Poznejte rostlinu jedním kliknutím.
reference: Know the plant with one click.
translation: Identify plants with one click.

source: My jsme se k ničemu nedostali, za poločas jsme vystřelili snad jednou.
reference: We didn't get anywhere, we took one shot at halftime.
translation: We didn't get anywhere, and we'd only had one shot by half time.

source: Na pláži podle místních médií zahynul 50letý muž a osmiletá holčička.
reference: A 50-year-old man and an eight-year-old girl were killed on the beach, according to local media.
translation: A 50-year-old man and an 8-year-old girl died on the beach according, to local media.

source: Bývalá golfová jednička Ronan Rafferty bude během následujících tří dnů doufat v pohodovou atmosféru v Renaissance Club ve skotské správní oblasti East Lothian, která hostí 25. ročník Scottish Senior Open.
reference: Former golfer Ronan Rafferty will be hoping for a relaxing atmosphere over the next three days at the Renaissance Club in the Scottish Administrative Region of East Lothian, which hosts the 25th Scottish Senior Open.
translation: Former European No 1 Ronan Rafferty will be hoping for home comforts over the next three days as the Renaissance Club in East Lothian hosts the 25th edition of the Scottish Senior Open.

source: Vstupné na turnaj je zdarma. Parkovné je 5 £ za auto s jedním cestujícím a 10 £ za auto se dvěma a více cestujícími.
reference: Entry to the tournament is free. £5 for a car with one passenger and £10 for a car with two or more passengers.
translation: Admission is free of charge, with car parking charged at £5 per car with one occupant and £10 per car with two or more occupants.

source: Přesto, že jsem schopná jí zajistit podmínky, ve kterých nezažije na vlastní kůži rasismus, neliší se žádným způsobem od jiného černošského dítěte-ženy.
reference: Even though I'm able to provide her with conditions in which she won't experience racism firsthand, she's no different from any other black child-woman.
translation: Even if I'm fortunate enough to provide her an experience where she doesn't personally experience blatant racism, she is no different than the next black woman-child.

source: Mnohá klišé se brzy omrzí: pohled z výškových budov, panoráma se okouká, místo aby na vás dýchalo atmosférou a reálnost města nedostává vašim představám.
reference: Many clichés soon tire: the view from the high-rise buildings, the panorama percolates instead of breathing atmosphere on you, and the realness of the city doesn't get to your imagination.
translation: So many of the cliches of a city disappoint: views from tall buildings get old, skylines grow too familiar to offer much of a thrill, and the reality of the city doesn't live up to the dream.

source: "Francouzi zhodnotí, jestli je přínosná, a potom ji do databáze přidají," informovala Poláčková.
reference: "The French will assess whether it is beneficial and then add it to the database," Polack reported.
translation: "The French will determine whether it is useful and then add it to the database," said Poláčková.

source: "Je to velmi čerstvá záležitost a policie v současné době na motivu celé záležitosti pracuje," řekl Kužel.

translation: "It is a very fresh matter, and the police are currently working on the motive for the whole incident," said Kužel.

translation: Barcelona appear to have crossed this line, with the Spanish club expressing an interesting in PSG midfielder Marco Verratti earlier this summer.

source: ‚Z těchto důvodů vypadá zvíře prakticky stejně jako v době křídy.
reference: 'For these reasons, the animal looks virtually the same as it did in the Cretaceous Age.
translation: 'The result is that the animal looks almost the same today as it did back in the Early Cretaceous.

source: Olej do ohně přilévá chudoba.

source: V roce 2007 ale svitla nová naděje v podobě nových majitelů, architektů Jany a Pavla Prouzových.

translation: However, in 2007 new hopes emerged in the form of new owners, architects Jana and Pavel Prouza.

source: Nyní máme k dispozici zkušební lék PrEP a jsme na dobré cestě k ochraně více než 10 000 lidí, kterým hrozí riziko nakažení HIV.'

translation: Now that the PrEP trial drug has been procured, we're well on the way to protecting over 10,000 people at risk of HIV.'

source: "Jsme vděčni francouzským orgánům za opatření, díky nimž zastavily velké množství drog směřujících do Austrálie," uvedl její výkonný ředitel Col Blanch.
reference: "We are grateful to the French authorities for the actions they have taken to stop large quantities of drugs going to Australia," said its managing director, Col Blanch.
translation: "We are grateful to the French authorities for taking measures that have stopped a large number of drugs targeting Australia," said managing director Col Blanch.

source: Brooks je 71letý bývalý kongresman státu Georgia a celoživotní bojovník za občanská práva.
reference: Brooks is a 71-year-old former Georgia congressman and lifelong civil rights campaigner.
translation: Brooks is a 71-year-old former Georgia state congressman and lifelong civil rights activist.

source: Papuánský policejní inspektor, generál Yotje Mende, novinářům sdělil, že jeho důstojníci pouze „zajišťovali“ stanici, která byla pod útokem.
reference: The Papuan police inspector general, Yotje Mende, told reporters that his officers were merely "securing" the station under attack.
translation: The Papua Police Chief Inspector General Yotje Mende told reporters that his officers were only "securing" their station because it was under attack.

source: Může být unavená, hovorná nebo být „v náladě“.
reference: She can be tired, talkative or "in the mood."
translation: She can be sleepy, conversational or she can 'be in the mood'!"

source: Svým honem na slušné lidi a osobnosti, které na kandidátkách případně nahradí i některé starosty, což připustil i Gazdík, navíc Dědek ruší i oblíbený argument šéfa STAN, že největší hodnotou hnutí jsou právě politicky prověření a zkušení starostové, tradičně nejoblíbenější politici i podle průzkumů.
reference: Moreover, in his hunt for decent people and personalities to possibly replace some of the mayors on the ballot, as even Gazdiev conceded, Grandpa also cancels out the STAN chief's popular argument that the movement's greatest value is precisely politically proven and experienced mayors, traditionally the most popular politicians even according to the polls.
translation: In his pursuit of decent people and personalities that will potentially replace some of the mayors as candidates, as even Gazdík conceded, Dědek is also dismissing the favourite argument of the head of STAN that the movement's greatest value lies precisely in the political scrutiny and experienced of the mayors, who are traditionally the most popular politicians, an idea also confirmed by the polls.

source: Dalším ze skvělých Skotů je Chris O'Hare, který poběží trať na 1500 m. V letošní sezóně vyhrál Britské týmové závody a Výroční hry.
reference: Another of the great Scots is Chris O'Hare, who will run the 1500m track, having won the British team races and the Anniversary Games this season.
translation: Chris O'Hare, who runs in the 1500m, is another Scot to watch, following a great season that included victory at the British Team trials and the Anniversary Games.

source: Dříve, pokud chtěl zaměstnanec nahlásit jakýkoliv problém, musel dohledat telefonní číslo nebo e-mail na vedení společnosti, oficiálně podat stížnost a doufat ve zdárné vyřešení.
reference: Previously, if an employee wanted to report any problem, they had to trace a phone number or e-mail to the management of the company, formally file a complaint and hope for a successful resolution.
translation: Previously, if an employee wanted to report a problem, he or she had to find a phone number or email for corporate headquarters, lodge a formal complaint, and hope it was taken seriously.

source: Sledovala fotografie policejních pásek a řvoucích lidí. Jeden z mužů tvrdil, že je otec oběti a v ruce držel ceduli s nápisem „Fergusonská policie zabila mého neozbrojeného syna“!
reference: One of the men claimed to be the victim's father, holding a sign that said, "Ferguson Police Killed My Unarmed Son!"
translation: There were photos of police tape and people yelling, and of a guy claiming to be Brown's father holding a sign that read, "Ferguson police just killed my unarmed son!"

source: Navalnyj v posledních dvou měsících zorganizoval dva velké protivládní pouliční protesty a oznámil, že se v březnu příštího roku chce ucházet o post hlavy státu.
reference: Navalny has organized two large anti-government street protests in the last two months and has announced that he wants to apply for the post of head of state in March next year.
translation: Navalny has organised two large anti-government street protests over the past two months, and announced that he is setting his sights on the head of state position in March next year.

source: Bylo by rozumné zvážit, zda by nebylo možné např. část odkrytých základů zakonzervovat a vhodným způsobem alespoň vizuálně zpřístupnit.
reference: It would be reasonable to consider, for example, the possibility of preserving some of the exposed foundations and making them at least visually accessible in an appropriate manner.
translation: It would be reasonable to consider whether it would be possible to preserve some of the uncovered foundations, for example, and at least make them accessible in an appropriate visual manner.

source: EPA na svých internetových stránkách uvádí, že dýchání vzduchu s obsahem ozonu „může snižovat funkci plic a zvyšovat respirační symptomy“, jako např. astma.
reference: The EPA states on its website that breathing air containing ozone "may decrease lung function and increase respiratory symptoms" such as asthma.
translation: The EPA's website says breathing air containing ozone "can reduce lung function and increase respiratory symptoms" like asthma.

source: Trvá nicméně na tom, že „toto není pouhá afirmativní záležitost“ a Ferrellová není hlavní hrdinkou dokumentu kvůli svým názorům.
reference: She insists, however, that "this is not a mere affirmative matter," and Ferrell is not the main heroine of the documentary because of her views.
translation: She insists, however, that "this is not some affirmative action type of thing" where Ferrell was chosen as the film's heart because of her identities.

source: Policie má v Ústeckém kraji 76 psů s různými specializacemi.
reference: Police have 76 dogs in the Ústí Region with different specialisations.
translation: The police have 76 dogs with different specialties in the Ústí region.

source: Podle mluvčího dubajské policie vypukl požár v devátém patře a šířil se nahoru.
reference: According to a spokesman for Dubai police, a fire broke out on the ninth floor and spread upwards.
translation: According to a spokesman for the Dubai Police, a fire broke out on the ninth floor and spread upwards.

source: Poprvé to bylo v roce 2002, kdy se rozhodovalo mezi jihomoravskými kandidáty.
reference: The first time was in 2002, when decisions were made among the South Moravian candidates.
translation: The first time was in 2002, when it was decided among the South Moravian candidates.

source: Bohužel, autor návodu opomněl uvést, že zatímco žárovka vpravo šla vyměnit opravdu jen ve třech krocích.

translation: Unfortunately, the author of the manual failed to state that, while the light bulb was was replaced in just three steps:

source: V případě, že se mu podaří ve vládě prosadit odkup vepřína za státní peníze, bude to jen další nešťastný krok v jeho již tak dost problematickém působení ve funkci ministra kultury.

translation: If he succeeds in pushing the government to buy a pig farm with state money, it will be just another unfortunate step in his already problematic time in the role of Minister of Culture.

source: Bez ohledu na to, že Johnson byl navždy vykázán z Twitteru za obtěžování; nebo že své tvrzení nepodložil žádným důkazem; nebo že již v minulosti zveřejnil falešná obvinění a později je odvolal.
reference: No matter that Johnson has been banished from Twitter forever for harassment; or that he has not substantiated his claim with any evidence; or that he has made false accusations in the past and later retracted them.
translation: No matter that Johnson had been permanently banned from Twitter for harassment or that he offered no concrete evidence or that he had lobbed false accusations in the past and recanted them.

source: „Zrovna teď jedeme do Fergusonu, protože policie zabila 18letého mladíka a to není správné.“

source: O několik týdnů později se Ferrellová během večerní demonstrace seznámila s pozdější spolurežisérkou dokumentu, Sabaah Folayanovou.
reference: A few weeks later, during an evening demonstration, Ferrell met the documentary's later co-director, Sabaah Folayan.
translation: Weeks later, Ferrell met Sabaah Folayan, one of the film's co-directors, during an evening demonstration.

source: Zatímco cílem dokumentu nebylo soustředit se na zážitky Ferrellové - ve snaze zobrazit, že hnutí „není o spasitelském vůdci, ale o sblížení komunity,“ uvedla Folayanová - se ukázalo, že právě ona je nejotevřenější vůči účasti na filmování.
reference: While the documentary was not intended to focus on Ferrell's experiences - in an attempt to portray that the movement "is not about a savior leader, but about bringing the community together," Folayan said - it turned out to be the one most open to participating in filmmaking.
translation: While the goal wasn't to focus on Ferrell's experience - in an effort to show that the movement is "not about a messiah leader but a community coming together," Folayan said - she proved to be the most open of the film's participants.

source: Uživatel @TheePharoah jí neustále retweetoval příspěvky na zeď.

source: Pracovník centra Čang Č-čung sdělil agentuře Nová Čína, že chovu pand hrozí velké riziko plynoucí z příbuzenského křížení.

translation: Nick Rascona hugs two of his castmates, and then breaks down crying in their arms; the emotional toll of the performance finally getting to him.

source: Původní posádka zůstala toho večera na místě spolu s helikoptérou a spolu s nimi také jednotka bezpečnostních pracovníků.

translation: The original flight crew was with the helicopter during the event, while unit security personnel remained with the aircraft while it was the ground.

source: Nikdo jiný na sebe takovou pozornost nepřitáhne.

source: Podle oficiálních čísel o vývoji platební bilance pak Čína za loňský rok měla v turismu deficit 217 miliard dolarů, což se rovná 44 procentům celého čínského přebytku v obchodu se zbožím.

translation: The verdict took effect in November 2015, when it was confirmed by the High Court in Olomouc.

source: Pouze jsem upozornila na fakt, že můžeme být na letošní mistrovství pyšní, protože se koná na domácí půdě.
reference: I merely drew attention to the fact that we can be proud of this year's championships because they are being held on home soil.
translation: I just drew on the fact that we're very lucky in this situation in that we've got a home World Championships.

source: Když si vezmu jeho program, tak tam má široké zapojení lidí do řízení společnosti, přímou demokracii, s tím se dá souhlasit.
reference: If I take his agenda, there's a broad involvement of people in the management of society, direct democracy, I can agree with that.
translation: Looking at his plan, it involves the widespread engagement of people in the management of society, i.e. direct democracy, which we can agree on.

source: Prezident Trump řekl Turnbullovi, že dohoda o dohledu USA nad uprchlíky směřujícími do Austrálie je „směšná“ a „hloupá“ a trval na tom, že pokud by souhlasil s takovou dohodou - která vzešla za vlády prezidenta Obamy - vypadal by jako „zdrogovaný“ poté,co navrhnul zákaz vstupu uprchlíků do USA.
reference: President Trump told Turnbull that the US surveillance agreement on refugees bound for Australia was "ridiculous" and "stupid" and insisted that if he agreed to such an agreement - which came under President Obama - he would look "drugged" after proposing a ban on refugees entering the US.
translation: Mr Trump told Mr Turnbull a deal for the US to take on refugees headed for Australia was "ridiculous," "rotten" and "stupid," insisting the deal, brokered under the Obama administration, would make him look like "a dope" after he had proposed a ban on refugee resettlement in the US.

source: Dle vyjádření FBI složil 25. července 1946 tehdejší významný majitel pozemků bílé pleti Loy Harrison za Malcoma kauci ve výši 600 $.
reference: According to the FBI, on July 25, 1946, then-prominent white landowner Loy Harrison posted $600 bail for Malcom.
translation: On July 25, 1946, Loy Harrison, a prominent white landowner, paid $600 to bail Malcom out of jail, according to the FBI.

source: Takový typ skepticismu pronikal do komunity prostřednictvím mnoha lidí, často bělochů, kteří chtěli vydělat na bolesti a rozhodnosti.
reference: This type of skepticism filtered into the community through many people, often white, who wanted to profit from pain and resolve.
translation: That skepticism was informed by countless instances of people - often white - coming into a community to profit off its pain and resilience.

source: Dlouho plánovaný let se obešel bez komplikací.
reference: The long-planned flight was uneventful.
translation: The long planned flight went without complications.

source: "Není mi dvacet, abych nad nimi dokázal mávnout rukou, ale taky je už tak neřeším," uvedl na konto vyřčených urážek Hruška.

translation: "I'm not going to throw my arms about like a 20 year-old, but I'm not going to try and resolve it any more," said Hruška, in response to the score of verbal insults.

source: Nevadilo jim přitom, že český stát stíhá Savova za daňové podvody a žádá jeho vydání do Česka.
reference: They didn't mind that the Czech state prosecuted Savov for tax fraud and demanded his extradition to the Czech Republic.
translation: They did not mind the fact that the Czech state is prosecuting Savov for tax fraud and asking for his extradition to the Czech Republic.

source: „Bílý Dům je potěšen přehlídkou ‚Made in America', jež představila produkty ze všech 50 států, které vyrábí Američané z amerických materiálů,“ uvedla zástupkyně tiskového sekretáře Lindsay Waltersová.
reference: "The White House is pleased with the "Made in America" show, which featured products from all 50 states made by Americans from American materials," said Deputy Press Secretary Lindsay Walters.
translation: "The White House is thrilled with the 'Made In America' showcase that featured products from all 50 states that are made by American workers with American materials," said White House deputy press secretary Lindsay Walters.

source: Bude to o vyjednávání vítěze s druhým v pořadí, ale bůh ví, kdo bude vítěz a kdo dvojka.

translation: The winner will negotiate with the person who comes second, but God knows who will be the winner and who number two.

source: „Největší chybou je žít v Mexiku a pracovat jako novinář,“ napsal Valdez v jedné ze svých mnoha knih o násilí, které se pojí s obchodem s drogami.
reference: "The biggest mistake is living in Mexico and working as a journalist," Valdez wrote in one of his many books on the violence involved in the drug trade.
translation: "The greatest error is to live in Mexico and to be a journalist," Valdez wrote in one of his many books on narco-violence.

source: Miller má fakticky pravdu, ale jak sám uvedl, tady nejde o historii.

translation: Miller is factually correct, but as he put it himself, this is not really about history.

source: Britská policie uvedla, že systém izolace a obložení londýnské Grenfell Tower mohlo přispět k rychlému šíření ohně při červnovém požáru, při němž zahynulo téměř 80 lidí.
reference: British police have said that the insulation and cladding system of London's Grenfell Tower may have contributed to the rapid spread of fire in the June fire, which killed nearly 80 people.
translation: In the UK, police have said they believe the system of insulation and cladding panels on London's Grenfell Tower may have contributed to the rapid spread of a fire there in June in which some 80 people died.

source: A policie nakonec pro nedostatek důkazů vyšetřování ukončila.
reference: And the police eventually shut down the investigation for lack of evidence.
translation: The police eventually ended the search because of the lack of evidence.

source: Ve školce je prosklený koridor, kde se podle ní teplota pohybuje kolem 40 stupňů.
reference: There's a glass corridor in the nursery where she says the temperature is in the mid-40s.

source: Samozřejmě je důležité, aby byli schopni domluvit se na programu koaliční vlády.
reference: Of course, it is important that they are able to agree on a coalition government agenda.

source: Nakonec zvítězila varianta, která rozložila obchod do zahrady rozkoše a ložnice, jíž vévodí postel.

translation: In the end, the variation that won saw the shop displayed as a garden of delights and a bedroom, dominated by beds.

source: Hlavní organizátor GMB Drew Duffy k tomu dodal: „Fakt, že se nám nedostalo jasné odpovědi ze strany stavbyvedoucího ohledně potřeb společnosti a budoucího plánu investic v Tollcross je pro naše členy velmi znepokojující.
reference: GMB chief organiser Drew Duffy added: "The fact that we have not had a clear answer from the site manager about the needs of the company and the future investment plan in Tollcross is very worrying for our members.
translation: GMB senior organiser Drew Duffy, said: "The fact that we cannot get clarity from the general site manager over the business needs and investment plan for the future of Tollcross is deeply concerning our members.

source: Pan al Almatari řekl webu MailOnline, že spravedlnost byla vykonána v souladu s právním systémem země.

source: Tolik skepse není na místě.

translation: The ruling is so final that it prevents Navalny from nominating himself under Russian law.

source: Royova sestra Camdyn Royová dosvědčila, že ji „pronásleduje“ vědomí toho, že se nikdy nezúčastní bratrovy svatby a nikdy nebude tetičkou jeho dětí.
reference: Roy's sister, Camdyn Roy, testified that she was "haunted" by the knowledge that she would never attend her brother's wedding and would never be his children's aunt.
translation: Mr Roy's sister, Camdyn Roy, testified that she was "haunted" by the realisation that she would never attend her brother's wedding or be an aunt to his children.

source: Ve třetí sezóně se DEA soustředí na nejbohatší drogový kartel na světě: Cali Cartel.

translation: Pistorius was convicted of murder after an appeal by prosecutors against an initial manslaughter verdict.

source: V tomto případě se podařilo navýšit obytnou plochu při zachování kvalitních materiálů, které propůjčují prostoru luxusní vzhled.

translation: Here they have managed to increase the floor space while using quality materials that give the space its luxurious edge.

source: Společnost v prohlášení na svých webových stránkách píše, že začne používat aktualizované strojové učení k detekci možných hoaxů, jež bude zasílat třetím stranám k ověření a potenciálně zobrazovat výsledky průzkumu pod původními příspěvky.
reference: The company writes in a statement on its website that it will start using updated machine learning to detect possible hoaxes, which it will send to third parties for verification and potentially display survey results below the original posts.
translation: The company said in a statement on its website it will start using updated machine learning to detect possible hoaxes and send them to fact checkers, potentially showing fact-checking results under the original article.

source: "Opakuju si stále slova písní, abych je nezapomněl," přiznal Karel.

source: Z procesních důvodů však už nebylo možné soudit Tomana za celou částku.

translation: People using the pseudonyms "Juricola," "Valerius," "Belisarius," and "Portius" all wrote letters to newspapers trashing Washington's decisions.

source: Abychom nashromáždili co nejvíce důkazů, je nezbytné, aby co nejvíce místních obyvatel ohlásilo jakékoliv nespolečenské nebo protiprávní chování polici na čísle 101.
reference: In order to gather as much evidence as possible, it is essential that as many local residents as possible report any unsociable or unlawful behaviour to the police on 101.
translation: To support our evidence gathering it is very important that as many local residents as possible report any anti-social or criminal behaviour to the police by calling 101.

source: Dalšími jsou Nikaragua, Dominikánská republika, Salvador, Haiti, Malta a Honduras.

source: V domovech pro seniory to podle ní často žádný lékař nehlídá.

source: „Pro nás je a vždy bude prioritou číslo jedna záchrana lidských životů. Velmi nás tedy mrzí, že nemůžeme v současné době operovat v záchranných zónách,“ uvedla organizace v prohlášení na sociálních sítích.
reference: "For us, saving people's lives is and always will be the number one priority, so we are very sorry that we cannot currently operate in rescue zones," the organisation said in a social media statement.
translation: "For us the rescue of human life is and will be our top priority, so we are very sorry we will not be able to operate in the search and rescue zone at the moment," the organisation said in a statement on social media.

translation: The former manager, Zaccheo Giovanni Pamio, is Italian, and therefore is not protected from extradition and could face trial in the United States.

source: Nyní, s Trumpem v Bílém domě, je najednou celá rodina - včetně všech republikánských sourozenců, se kterými se hašteřila o politice dlouhá léta - na jedné vlně.
reference: Now, with Trump in the White House, the whole family - including all the Republican siblings she'd been bickering with about politics for years - is suddenly on the same page.
translation: With Trump in the White House, everyone she knows, including the Republican sibling she had been bickering with about politics for decades, is suddenly and peculiarly on the same side.

source: "Teplota, která je v interiéru i exteriéru, překračuje hygienické limity pro mateřské školy, takže v tomto období bychom vlastně neměli ani mít otevřený provoz," uvedla ředitelka školky Miloslava Makovičková.
reference: "The temperature, which is both indoors and exterior, exceeds the hygiene limits for nursery schools, so we shouldn't really have open operations during this period," said Miloslava Makovičková, the nursery director.
translation: "The indoor and outdoor temperatures exceed the hygienic limits for kindergartens, so we should not really have been operating at that time," said Miloslava Makovičková, the school director.

source: Ústavní soud v Chile má deset členů a koncem srpna by měl dostat nového předsedu, který je podle AFP blízký opozici.

translation: The Constitutional Court in Chile has ten members, and at the end of August it should get a new president, who is close to the opposition according to the AFP.

source: Washington mění podmínky udělování zelené karty

source: Pokuty ve výši 300 tisíc rublů, potažmo 25 tisíc rublů soud ve čtvrtek uložil také dvěma členům Navalného předvolebního týmu, Leonidu Volkovovi a Nikolaji Ljaskinovi.

translation: In addition to the 300,000 roubles, on Thursday the court also imposed fines 25,000 roubles on two members of Navalny's pre-election Team, Leonid Volkov and Nikolai Ljaskin.

source: V úterý byly překonány nebo vyrovnány rekordy na 35 ze 145 meteorologických stanic měřících přes 30 let.

translation: On Tuesday, records were beaten or matched in 35 of the 145 meteorological stations, which have been measuring the weather for over 30 years.

source: Kalifornie vyhlásila zákaz cestování svých občanů do státu Tennessee a dalších sedmi států.

translation: California has declared a ban on its citizens traveling to Tennessee and seven other states.

source: Jako kulturní artefakt je to lehká parodie a zároveň také ztělesnění naší moderní facebookovské éry trvalých vzpomínek.

translation: As a cultural artifact, it's both a sendup and embodiment of our Facebook-enabled era of permanent reminiscence.

source: Všichni byli propuštěni ještě téhož dne, šetření však pokračuje.
reference: They were all released the same day, but the investigation continues.
translation: The same day they were released, while an investigation is currently underway.

source: V mnoha případech šlo přitom podle ochránců lidských práv o spontánní potrat, který soud označil za vraždu.

source: "Navrhovatel je přesvědčen, že zadavatel dospěl k rozhodnutí o výběru dodavatele veřejné zakázky na základě ryze subjektivního hodnocení, jednoznačně favorizujícího účastníka Mladá fronta, a.s., na úkor navrhovatele a dalších dodavatelů," píše se v návrhu na zahájení řízení podaného na ÚOHS tento týden, který zveřejnil server Aktuálně.
reference: "The appellant is convinced that the contracting authority arrived at the decision to select the contractor of the contract on the basis of a purely subjective evaluation, clearly favouring the participant Mladá fronta, a.s., at the expense of the appellant and other contractors," reads the application to initiate proceedings filed at the OBR this week, published by the Aktuálně website.
translation: "The claimant is convinced that the contracting authority made the decision on the selection of a public procurement contractor on the basis of a purely subjective assessment, clearly favouring the participant Mladá fronta at the expense of the claimant and other suppliers," reads the motion for the opening of proceedings submitted to the ÚOHS this week, which was published by the server Aktuálně.

source: Lidé s vysokoškolským vzděláním si u nás měsíčně přijdou zhruba na padesát tisíc.

translation: People with a university education earn about 50,000 crowns per month in our country.

source: Toť fakta, nyní komentář.

translation: The above is all fact, and now for a commentary.

source: Před incidentem se Sally byl u své bývalé přítelkyně, pili alkohol a vzali si kokain, to řekl na policii sám Dexie.

source: „Pokud jsou lidé ve své práci šťastní, vnímají, že jejich hlas je vyslyšen, a že jejich práce je odměňující, usilují o úspěch společnosti,“ řekla Nina McQueenová, viceprezidentka globálních benefitů a zaměstnaneckých výhod společnosti LinkedIn, která využívá Convercent i Glint.

source: Americká Agentura pro ochranu životního prostředí odvolala své rozhodnutí o odkladu zákona Obamovy administrativy, který nařizoval státům snížit emise, a to pouhý den poté, co agenturu zažalovalo 15 států.
reference: The US Environmental Protection Agency has revoked its decision to delay an Obama administration law that mandated states to reduce emissions, just one day after 15 states sued the agency.
translation: The U.S. Environmental Protection Agency reversed a decision to delay an Obama-era rule requiring states to curb smog-causing emissions, one day after 15 states sued the agency over the move.

source: Overal se jí totiž kolikrát zařízl mezi půlky, navíc se jí vykasal tak vysoko, že si ho musela pořád upravovat.
reference: Overal had cut between her buttocks a number of times, and she had climbed so high that she had to keep adjusting it.
translation: Her overalls cut into her thighs several times, plus she was so tall that she had to keep adjusting them.

source: Guglielmi k tomu dodal, že v pátrání po podezřelých pomáhají policii místní, regionální a celonárodní úřady.
