translation: Guglielmi said local, regional and national authorities are helping find the suspects.

source: Na základě dostatečně kvalitní fotografie květu, listu nebo plodu rostliny dokáže aplikace během několika sekund rozpoznat její název, který pak v češtině i ve slovenštině přiřadí pod fotografii.
reference: Based on a good enough photograph of a flower, leaf or fruit of a plant, the application can recognize its name in seconds, which it then assigns under the photograph in both Czech and Slovak.
translation: Starting from sufficiently high quality photos of a flower, leaf or fruit, the app can find its name in a few seconds, which will then appear under the photo in both Czech and Slovak.

source: Kde všude mohou Češi volit?

translation: Where in the world can Czechs vote?

source: "Už děti, které udrží tablet nebo mobil v ruce, mohou vyrazit do lesa," uvedla koordinátorka tohoto projektu Ivana Poláčková.

translation: "Children can go out into the forest with a tablet or mobile phone in their hands," said Ivana Poláčková, the coordinator of the project.

source: "Někteří z policistů se museli brodit rákosovými mokřinami stovky metrů, než pod nohama ucítili zase pevnou zem," přiblížila Baláková.

translation: "Some of the police officers had to wade through reed marshes for hundreds of metres before they felt the ground under their feet again," stated Baláková.

source: Dva z vojáků v podnapilém stavu pronásledovali skupinku dětí a zbili je pažbami svých zbraní, uvedli oběti a svědkové události.

translation: The soldiers, who had been drinking, chased and beat the group with their rifle butts, said victims and witnesses.

source: Ty věci nelze házet do jednoho pytle.

source: „Nutí mě to uvědomit si, že lynčování je stále aktuální téma,“ dodala k tomu, „jenom se mu říká policejní potyčky“.
reference: "It makes me realize that lynching is still an issue," she added, "it's just called police skirmishes."
translation: "What this really does to me is make me think that lynchings are still going on," she added, "they're just called police shootings now."

source: Za páté, neznám situaci v americké historii, kdy si státy kvůli politickým otázkám takovéto naschvály dělaly, kromě případu jediného.

translation: Fifth, I do not know of any situation in US history when states have done this for political reasons except this case.

source: Navalnyj, který je považován za bojovníka proti korupci, však příslušný rozsudek pokládá za politicky motivovaný.

translation: However, Navalny, who is considered to be a fighter against corruption, believes the judgment to be politically motivated.

source: Většina sklizně je určena pro potřeby rodiny, zbytek prodávají na místním trhu.
reference: Most of the harvest is for family use, with the rest sold at the local market.
translation: They usually keep most of the harvest for the family, with the rest sold in the local market.

source: Zdroj této zprávy si přál zůstat v anonymitě, jelikož není oprávněn situaci s PSG komentovat, uvedla agentura The Associated Press.
reference: The source of this report wished to remain anonymous as he is not authorized to comment on the situation with PSG, The Associated Press reported.
translation: They spoke to The Associated Press on condition of anonymity as they were not authorized to discuss the PSG situation.

source: „Za vlády předchozí administrace EPA často neplnila termíny a čekala, až bude zažalována aktivistickými skupinami a ostatními, souhlasíc s urovnáním a dalším nastavením plánů,“ řekl Pruitt, který ve své předchozí pozici podal na EPA více než tucet žalob.
reference: "Under the previous administration, the EPA often failed to meet deadlines and waited to be sued by activist groups and others, agreeing to a settlement and further scheduling," said Pruitt, who filed more than a dozen lawsuits against the EPA in his previous position.
translation: "Under previous administrations, EPA would often fail to meet designation deadlines, and then wait to be sued by activist groups and others, agreeing in a settlement to set schedules for designation," said Pruitt, who sued EPA more than a dozen times in his prior job.

source: „Nevěříme v regulaci pomocí soudní spory a plnění termínu bereme vážně.

translation: "We do not believe in regulation through litigation, and we take deadlines seriously.

source: Případ přitáhl pozornost celého národa poté, co byly zveřejněny textové zprávy Carterové, které podněcovaly sebevraždu.

translation: The case drew national attention after Carter's text messages revealed she had encouraged him to end his life.

source: Barcelona je rozhořčena způsobem, jakým se Neymar vyvázal ze své smlouvy, navzdory tomu, že důvěrný zdroj potvrdil, že klub se vždy snažil Neymarovi ve všem vyhovět již od jeho příchodu ze Santos v roce 2013.
reference: Barcelona are outraged at the way Neymar has released himself from his contract, despite a confidential source confirming that the club has always tried to accommodate Neymar in everything since his arrival from Santos in 2013.
translation: Barcelona are known to be furious with the manner of the approach and the way that Neymar has forced his way out, despite a source close to the Catalans' board insisting that the club have always done their best to look after him since his arrival from Santos in 2013.

source: Opatření stále neprošla senátem.

translation: The measure has not yet been brought to a vote in the Senate.

source: Historii tábora náhodně objevil v roce 1992 Američan Paul Polansky, v roce 1995 byl v Letech odhalen památník.

translation: The history of the camp was accidentally discovered in 1992 by American Paul Polansky, and a memorial was erected at Lety in 1995.

source: Kaczyński zároveň prohlásil, že varoval německou kancléřku Angelu Merkelovou, že s Donaldem Tuskem to může dopadnout různě, ale nevzala to na vědomí.
reference: At the same time, Kaczynski said he had warned German Chancellor Angela Merkel that things could turn out differently with Donald Tusk, but she did not take note.
translation: Kaczynski also stated that he warned German Chancellor Angela Merkel that it might turn out differently with Donald Tusk, but she didn't pay attention to it.

source: Možná by si pak nemusel klást otázku, proč má u nás politika tak špatnou pověst.
reference: Maybe then he wouldn't have to wonder why politics has such a bad reputation with us.
translation: Perhaps then he would not have had to ask why politics has such a bad reputation in our country.

source: Pro mě je to triviální záležitost.
reference: To me, it's a trivial matter.
translation: It's a trivial matter, in my opinion.

source: Neklamným znakem Trumpovy éry se stávají politické rozkoly, které rozdělují americké voliče a v mikro měřítku také zpřetrhávají celé rodiny.
reference: Political divisions are becoming an unmistakable sign of the Trump era, dividing the American electorate and, on a micro scale, tearing apart entire families.
translation: It has become a truism of the Trump era that the political divisions that have polarised the US electorate have, on a micro-scale, torn families apart.

source: „Dříve jsme nosili pouze listí.“

translation: We had a regular meeting with employees and GMB representatives at Tollcross two months ago at which a number of issues were discussed openly.

source: "Nejvíce zasahovali ve Středočeském kraji," pokračuje Zaoralová.

source: Jedná se o to, že Kalifornie zakázala vynakládat státní peníze na cesty svých občanů do osmi jiných států, jimiž jsou Alabama, Jižní Dakota, Kansas, Kentucky, Mississippi, Severní Karolína, Tennessee a Texas.
reference: The issue is that California has prohibited spending state money on its citizens' travel to eight other states, namely Alabama, South Dakota, Kansas, Kentucky, Mississippi, North Carolina, Tennessee and Texas.
translation: Rather, California has forbidden spending state money for its citizens to travel to eight other states, namely Alabama, South Dakota, Kansas, Kentucky, Mississippi, North Carolina, Tennessee and Texas.

source: „Co se stalo?“ otáže se Rascona.
reference: "What happened?" he asks Rascon.
translation: "What?!," Rascona asked.

source: Velmi smutná historie nesmírných útrap lidských bytostí, které jim způsobily zase lidské bytosti a zvrhlá ideologie.

translation: It is a very sad history of enormous suffering on the part of human beings caused to them by human beings and perverse ideology.

source: "Nesnáším přijímání těchto lidí," poznamenal Trump.
reference: "I hate receiving these people," Trump observed.

source: Těsně před rozhodnutím banka prohlásila: „MPC předpovídá, že hrubý domácí produkt (HDP) bude z krátkodobého hlediska stagnovat spolu s nátlakem na reálné příjmy domácností a zatížením spotřeby.“
reference: Just before the decision, the Bank said: "The MPC predicts that gross domestic product (GDP) will stagnate in the short term, along with a squeeze on real household incomes and a strain on consumption."
translation: In minutes of the rates decision, the Bank said: "In the MPC's central forecast, gross domestic product (GDP) remains sluggish in the near-term as the squeeze on households' real incomes continues to weigh on consumption."

source: Scotney však byl ze svého útulného místečka u řeky Bewl v britském Kentu svědkem 700 let bouřlivé historie, která inspirovala kudrnatého Jamieho Rhodese z Yorkského hrabství - známého zálibou v historických dokumentech - k vytvoření grafické novely.
reference: But Scotney witnessed 700 years of stormy history from his cozy spot by the Bewl River in Kent, Britain, which inspired the curly-haired Jamie Rhodes of York County - known for his fondness for historical documents - to create a graphic novel.
translation: But Scotney has witnessed 700 years of tumultuous history from its cosy seat in Bewl River valley in Kent, now inspiration for a graphic novel written by Jamie Rhodes, a mop-haired Yorkshireman with a penchant for historical documents.

source: Sledovat tuto rekonstrukci není snadné a ještě obtížnější je odvrátit zrak, ale Greeneová říká, že to má svůj smysl.
reference: Watching this reconstruction isn't easy, and it's even more difficult to look away, but Greene says it makes sense.
translation: It's difficult to watch, and even more difficult to look away, but Greene said that's the point.

source: Pro ty, kteří se rozhodli zůstat a nevzdat se své práce, představuje každý den velké riziko.

translation: For those who stay behind and continue the work, it's a daily dance of high-risk decisions.

source: Lidé, kteří neznají a nestudují historii své země jsou odsouzeni k jejímu opakování.“
reference: People who do not know and study the history of their country are doomed to repeat it."
translation: Those who don't study their history, those who do not know their history, are doomed to repeat it."

source: Jeho ztráta je citelná, i když jeho přítomnost je všeprostupující - velká fotografie Valdeze s nápisem „Spravedlnost“, na které ukazuje prostředníček, visí v průčelí budovy; dva novináři - Aaron Ibarra a Miriam Ramirez - věkem přes 30 let, mají tričko s fotografií Valdeze s úsměvem na tváři, brýlemi na nose a čepicí Panama.
reference: His loss is palpable, though his presence is all-pervasive - a large photograph of Valdez with the word "Justice" on it, in which he gives the finger, hangs in the front of the building; two journalists - Aaron Ibarra and Miriam Ramirez - aged over 30, wearing a T-shirt with a photograph of Valdez with a smile on his face, glasses on his nose, and a Panama cap.
translation: His absence is felt deeply, although his presence is everywhere - a large photo of Valdez displaying his middle finger, with the word "Justice," hangs on the facade of the Riodoce building; two reporters on their 30s, Aaron Ibarra and Miriam Ramirez, wear T-shirts that display his smiling, bespectacled face or his trademark Panama hat.

source: Rapper ze St. Louis zveřejňoval na Twitter své příspěvky o smrti Michaela Browna, neozbrojeného 18letého mladíka, kterého zastřelil policista bílé pleti ve městě Ferguson, Missouri.
reference: The St. Louis rapper was posting on Twitter about the death of Michael Brown, an unarmed 18-year-old who was shot by a white police officer in Ferguson, Missouri.
translation: The St. Louis-area rapper was live-tweeting the death of Michael Brown, an unarmed black 18-year-old killed by a white police officer in Ferguson, Mo.

source: Rok výroby 2003 ještě měl takovou knížečku s návodem drobných oprav, mezi které patřila mimo jiné výměna žárovky blinkru.

source: „Vše bylo oznámeno a vše bude také implementováno.

source: Za poslední půl rok ho poškodili čtyřikrát.

translation: It has been damaged four times in the last half year.

source: Pokud chce Čína více zahraničních turistů a jejich tvrdé měny, mělo by pro ně být jednodušší se tam dostat.
reference: If China wants more foreign tourists and their hard currency, it should be easier for them to get there.
translation: If China wants more foreign tourists and their hard currencies, it should be easier for them to get there.

source: Zpět v Bílém Domě Trump oslovil zástupce společnosti Sikorsky a vtipkoval s médii o své vlastní flotile produktů.

translation: Inside the White House, Trump addressed Sikorsky representatives, joking with the media about his own fleet of company products.

source: „Na tenhle zápas jen tak nezapomenete.
reference: "You don't just forget this game.
translation: "This is the fight to be made.

source: Pro někoho, kdo je tak fascinován starými papíry, je podpora ze strany organizace National Trust a Arts Council England a možnost přebývat téměř čtyři měsíce na hradě téměř jako sen. („Abych pravdu řekl, pobyt jsem si trochu prodloužil.“)
reference: For someone who is so fascinated by old papers, the support from the National Trust and Arts Council England and being able to stay in the castle for almost four months is almost like a dream. ("To tell you the truth, I've extended my stay a little bit.")
translation: For someone so smitten with old papers, getting support from the National Trust and Arts Council England and living in a castle for almost four months ("I overstayed my welcome a little bit, to be honest") seems too good to be true.

source: Carterové bylo 17 let, když byl Roy nalezen v roce 2014 na sedadle automobilu, otrávený oxidem uhličitým.

translation: Carter was 17 when Mr Roy was found dead of carbon monoxide poisoning in a vehicle in 2014.

source: Jednopokojový byt s komplikovaným rozvržením - abyste se dostali do ložnice, museli jste projít kuchyní - chtěla Joanne přidat odkládací prostory a mezipatro, aby využila vysoký strop.
reference: A one-bedroom apartment with a complicated layout - you had to go through the kitchen to get to the bedroom - Joanne wanted to add a storage area and a mezzanine level to take advantage of the high ceiling.
translation: Originally a one-bedroom property with a convoluted layout - you had to walk through the kitchen to get to the bedroom - Joanne wanted to add storage space and a mezzanine to make the most of the generous ceiling height.

source: Loni byl italský ragbista Davide Vasta pozitivně testován na 11 dopingových látek, což bylo do té doby rekordní množství u přistižených sportovců.
reference: Last year, Italian rugby player Davide Vasta tested positive for 11 doping substances, a record high for athletes caught.
translation: Last year, Italian rugby player Davide Vasta tested positive for 11 doping substances, which was a record among all the athletes ever caught.

source: Hlavní zkoušky letošní rekonstrukce započaly v červnu a hned první den se přibližně 30 herců - tucet bělochů, zbytek černoši - nahrnulo do místnosti, kde je Greeneová seznámila s velmi pečlivě naplánovaným představením.
reference: The main rehearsals for this year's reenactment began in June, and on the first day, approximately 30 actors - a dozen white, the rest black - crowded into a room where Greene introduced them to a very carefully planned performance.
translation: Rehearsals for this year's production began in June, and on the first day nearly 30 actors - a dozen white and the rest black - crowded into a room and listened as Greene launched into a well-rehearsed overview of the play.

source: „Tohle není ten typ vraždy, na které jsme si zvykli a kterou můžeme nazvat normální.
reference: "This isn't the kind of murder we've grown accustomed to and can call normal.
translation: "'This isn't the type of murder that we've become used to and can call typical.'

source: Z respondentů, kteří přiznali, že se pokusili vědomě cestovat s předmětem, který je zakázán TSA, bylo 19,7 procenta cestujících s několika tisíci nalétaných hodin v porovnání s méně než 15 procenty členů Generace X.
reference: Of the respondents who admitted to having attempted to knowingly travel with an object that is prohibited by the TSA, 19.7 percent of passengers with several thousand hours were passengers compared to less than 15 percent of Generation X members.
translation: Of the respondents who admitted knowingly trying to fly with something banned by the TSA, 19.7 per cent were millennials, compared with less than 15 per cent who were members of Generation X.

source: „Museli jsme vyřešit technickou stránku,“ hovoří Erfan o vyztužených dýhovaných dvířkách.
reference: "We had to sort out the technical side," Erfan says of the reinforced veneer doors.
translation: "A bit of engineering went into that," explains Erfan of the steel-reinforced, veneered MDF door.

source: Lidé by si proto měli nechat své ohřívače vody zkontrolovat, varují záchranáři.
reference: People should therefore have their water heaters checked, rescue workers warn.
translation: As such, people should have their water heaters checked, rescue services warned.

source: Je-li do problému zapleten generální ředitel, stížnosti jsou odesílány přímo správní radě.
reference: If the Director-General is implicated, complaints are sent directly to the Management Board.
translation: And if the chief executive is implicated, complaints go straight to the board of directors.

source: Předešlé sankce uvržené na PSG znamenají, že UEFA bude pozorně sledovat jakýkoliv pokus o obcházení pravidel,
reference: Previous sanctions imposed on PSG mean UEFA will closely monitor any attempt to circumvent the rules,
translation: Past sanctions slapped on PSG means that UEFA will be even more watchful of any attempt to circumvent the rules.

source: Každý den mívají také k jídlu zeleninový salát a k svačině vždy čerstvé ovoce a zeleninu, kterou jim někdy přináší i rodiče.
reference: They also have a vegetable salad to eat every day, and always fresh fruit and vegetables to snack on, sometimes brought by their parents.
translation: They also eat green salad every day, and their snacks always include fresh fruits and vegetables, which sometimes brought by their parents.

source: Majitel McVitie's, společnost Pladis, uvedla, že v rámci několika předchozích let investovala do celé oblasti více než 5 milionů liber.

translation: McVitie's owner Pladis said it had invested more than £5m at the site in the last few years.

source: „Nikdo nechce mluvit o lynčování, protože při tom musíme čelit nepříjemným pocitům, které se ukrývají v každém z nás,“ řekla Greeneová.
reference: "No one wants to talk about lynching because in doing so we have to face the uncomfortable feelings that lurk within each of us," Greene said.
translation: "We don't want to talk about the lynching because it makes us face the ugliness in all of us," she said.

source: Pokud člověk nemá rodinu, není to problém.
reference: If you don't have a family, it's not a problem.
translation: If you don't have a family it's not a problem.

source: Odsouzený korupčník a král českého hazardu Ivo Valenta si pořídil Stranu soukromníků.
reference: Convicted corruptor and king of Czech gambling, Ivo Valenta, has acquired the Party of Private People.
translation: Convicted corrupter and Czech gambling king Ivo Valenta bought up the Strana soukromníků (Freeholder Party).

source: Několik nejmovitějších vlastníků domů v anglickém hrabství West Midland se opět pouští do pře s odhodlanými turisty, kteří vyjednávají s místními úřady o práva na opětovné získání pole za jejich sídly.
reference: Several of the most affluent homeowners in England's West Midland are once again engaged in a dispute with determined tourists as they negotiate with local authorities for the rights to reclaim the fields behind their mansions.
translation: Some of the West Midlands' wealthiest homeowners are again at loggerheads with determined travellers who have negotiated a council-dug trench to reclaim a field outside their mansions.

source: Na mých 63 kg jsem malý.
reference: I'm small for my 63 kg.

source: „Zápas by měl probíhat stylem platby za zhlédnutí, to si žádají fanoušci,“ řekl Garcia, který se později vyjádřil, že je otevřen možnosti odvysílat zápas prostřednictvím televizní stanice, která přijde s nejlepší nabídkou.
reference: "The game should be a pay-per-view style, that's what the fans demand," said Garcia, who later commented that he was open to the possibility of broadcasting the game through the television station that comes up with the best offer.
translation: "This fight could be on pay-per-view because all the fans have been asking about it," Garcia said, later expressing openness to fighting on whatever network offers the best financial package.

source: Celkem tři kroky a dílo mělo být hotovo.

translation: After a total of three steps, the job should have been done.

translation: According to Minister of Culture Herman, "there are some figures, but I would probably upset the plans if I went to the public with them."

source: O udělení zakázky měla podle původních kritérií CzechTrade rozhodovat ze 60 procent nabídnutá cena a ze zbývajících 40 soutěž krásy, tedy kvalita projektu.
reference: According to the original CzechTrade criteria, the award was to be decided 60 percent by the price offered and the remaining 40 by a beauty contest, the quality of the project.
translation: According to CzechTrade's basic criteria, 60% of the decision to award the contract was based on the price offered and the 40% on the appeal and quality of the proposal.

source: Tak jako tak to v žádném případě nebude levná záležitost.
reference: Either way, it's not going to be a cheap proposition.
translation: In any case, it will definitely not be a cheap matter.

translation: "He should be afraid," announced brother of the dead president and leader of the Law and Justice party Jaroslaw Kaczynski at Tusk's address.

source: Designové vibrátory stojí i desítky tisíc.
reference: Designer vibrators cost tens of thousands.
translation: Designer vibrators cost tens of thousands of crowns.

source: Místo měsíčních odvodů DPH a spotřební daně v řádech nejméně desítek milionů korun platila daně v pouhých statisících.
reference: Instead of paying monthly VAT and excise duties amounting to at least tens of millions of crowns, it paid taxes in the hundreds of thousands.
translation: Instead of monthly VAT and excise duties to the order of at least tens of millions of Czech crowns, the company only paid taxes amounting to just a few hundred thousand.

source: „Neměl jsem možnost obhajovat své vítězství na Extremadura Open, protože rok po mém vítězství byl turnaj zrušen.
reference: "I didn't have a chance to defend my victory at the Extremadura Open because the tournament was cancelled the year after I won.
translation: "I didn't get to defend the Extremadura Open because that was taken off the schedule the year after I won it.

source: Jméno Intimity se zalíbilo oběma.
reference: Intimacy's name appealed to both of them.
translation: Both of them liked the name Intimity.

source: Bývalý ředitel Carlton Football Club a developer Colin De Lutis přebývá na panství Toorak, jen tři místnosti od svého mladšího bratra Paula, který dohnal spor o společný majetek a obchodní jmění až k nejvyššímu soudu.
reference: Former Carlton Football Club director and developer Colin De Lutis is staying at the Toorak estate, just three rooms away from his younger brother Paul, who has driven a dispute over joint property and business assets to the supreme court.
translation: Former Carlton Football Club director and developer Colin De Lutis lives in a Toorak mansion three doors from younger brother Paul, who has taken him to the Supreme Court over how their property and business assets will be sliced up.

source: "Celý koncept musí respektovat postupné stírání dříve zřejmých hranic mezi jednotlivými typy hrozeb," uvádí se v záměru s odkazem na nebezpečí takzvaných hybridních hrozeb.
reference: "The whole concept must respect the gradual blurring of previously obvious boundaries between different types of threats," the intention states, referring to the dangers of so-called hybrid threats.
translation: "The whole concept must respect the gradual elimination of the previously clear boundaries between the different types of threats," the proposal states, referring to the danger of so-called hybrid threats.

source: Deiyaiský parlament se dožadoval potrestání zúčastněných policistů a stažení mobilní brigády z oblasti.
reference: The Deiyai parliament demanded the punishment of the police officers involved and the withdrawal of the mobile brigade from the area.
translation: The Deiyai parliament has called for the officers involved to be held to account and the police mobile brigade to be withdrawn from the area.

source: Vrah řekl: "On byl vážně naštvaný a po jeho útoku začala dívka křičet."
reference: The killer said, "He was really upset, and after his attack, the girl started screaming."
translation: The murderer said, "He was really upset, and after he attacked her the girl started screaming."

source: Ve výčepu ochutnáte tradiční světlý ležák, ale i tmavá piva a speciály.
reference: In the saloon you will taste traditional pale lager, as well as dark beers and specials.
translation: In the beer you, you can taste traditional light lager as well as dark beers and specialties.

source: I kdyby nakrásně celou transakci financoval Výbor OSN pro lidská práva, což zřejmě nehrozí, bylo by to podle mě stejně vyhazování peněz.
reference: Even if the entire transaction was funded by the UN Human Rights Committee, which seems unlikely, I think it would still be a waste of money.
translation: Even if the whole transaction were funded by the UN Human Rights Committee, which obviously is not likely, in my opinion it would still be a waste of money.

source: "Běželi jsme dolů po schodech, trvalo nám to z 50. patra asi deset minut," popsal události nájemník George.
reference: "We ran down the stairs, took about ten minutes from the 50th floor," said tenant George.
translation: "We ran down the stairs, which took us about ten minutes from the 50th floor," tenant George described the scene.

source: Průměrná váha novorozené pandy je o 70 gramů nižší.
reference: The average weight of a newborn panda is 70 grams less.
translation: The average weight of a newborn panda is 70 grams less.

source: Ve skutečnosti jen zřídkakdy používá pánev.
reference: In fact, she rarely uses a frying pan.
translation: She rarely even uses a pot.

source: Nedostatek smysluplného rozvoje jen prohlubuje odloučení domorodých lidí kmenů Mee, Moni, Dani a Damal, kteří žijí v centrálních vysočinách.
reference: The lack of meaningful development only deepens the separation of the indigenous people of the Mee, Moni, Dani and Damal tribes who live in the central highlands.
translation: The lack of meaningful development feeds the discontent of the tribal Mee, Moni, Dani, and Damal peoples, who live sprawled across Papua's verdant central highlands.

source: Vrak jejich automobilu nalezl laický potápěč na dně řeky Volhy ve městě Čeboksary v Čuvašsku.
reference: The wreck of their car was found by a lay diver at the bottom of the Volga River in Cheboksary, Chuvashksk.
translation: A diver found the wreck of their car lying on the bottom of the River Volga in the town of Cheboksary in Chuvashia.

source: Jak chcete mít soudržný tým, když se ministři chovají hlavně stranicky?
reference: How are you going to have a cohesive team if ministers behave mainly in a partisan way?
translation: How do you expect to have a cohesive team when the ministers mainly act on behalf of the party?

source: Posledně jmenovaná organizace ve čtvrtek uvedla, že nová pravidla nejsou nezbytná, ale přijatelná, jelikož nepředstavují žádnou „podstatnou změnu nebo překážku“ co se záchranných operací týče.
reference: The latter organisation said on Thursday that the new rules were not necessary but acceptable as they did not represent any "substantial change or obstacle" to rescue operations.
translation: The latter said on Thursday it regarded the new rules as unnecessary but acceptable as they would not involve any "significant change or impediment" to its rescue operations.

source: Fosilní pozůstatky tohoto druhu jsou zachovány do také míry, že obrněné pláty kolem lebky stále pokrývají zbytky kůže.
reference: The fossil remains of this species are also preserved to the extent that the armored plates around the skull still cover the remnants of the skin.
translation: Fossilized remnants of skin still cover the bumpy armor plates dotting the animal's skull.

source: A po dvanácti letech rodina čelí dalším útokům ze strany vandalů ničící její hrob.
reference: And 12 years later, the family faces more attacks from vandals destroying her grave.
translation: Twelve years later, the family faced further acts of aggression, with vandals destroying her grave.

source: Podle svědků v okolních budovách vypadl proud.
reference: Witnesses said the power went out in nearby buildings.
translation: According to witnesses in the surrounding buildings, the electricity cut out.

source: Zdejší obyvatelé si své potraviny pěstují: hlavně sladké brambory, ovoce a listovou zeleninu.
reference: The people here grow their food: mainly sweet potatoes, fruit and leafy vegetables.
translation: People here grow everything they eat: mainly nota plus some fruit and leafy vegetables.

source: Sluší se dodat, že Miller nezaútočil na sochu jako takovou.
reference: It is fitting that Miller did not attack the statue itself.
translation: In fairness, Miller did not attack the statue itself.

source: Levandule se staly symbolem Provence v oblasti jihovýchodní Francie, nyní jsou však ohroženy změnou klimatu.
reference: Lavender has become a symbol of Provence in the region of south-eastern France, but is now under threat from climate change.
translation: It has become a symbol of Provence in southern France, but there is a warning that it's under threat from climate change.

source: Úrazy, které utrpí oběti útoků kyselinou, mohou podle plastických chirurgů vyžadovat stovky chirurgických zákroků a roky léčení.
reference: Accidents suffered by victims of acid attacks can require hundreds of surgical procedures and years of treatment, according to plastic surgeons.
translation: According to plastic surgeons, injuries affecting sufferers of acid attacks can require hundreds of surgical interventions and years of healing.

source: "Nad tou hruškou se jen pousměju - hruška je zdravé ovoce a má spoustu vitaminů," reagoval Láďa.
reference: "I just smile at the pear - the pear is a healthy fruit and has plenty of vitamins," said Lad.
translation: "I just smile over the pear - pears are healthy and full of vitamins," said Láďa.

source: Dařilo se mu přežívat tak dlouho a všichni jeho přátelé a kolegové věřili, že se to nikdy nezmění.
reference: He had managed to survive for so long, and all his friends and colleagues believed that would never change.
translation: He'd survived for so long, his friends and colleagues assumed he'd always be there.

source: Nová studie však naznačuje pravý opak: strava bohatá na živočišný protein a mléčné výrobky by mohla pomáhat ulevit od příznaků zánětlivých onemocnění střev.
reference: But a new study suggests just the opposite: a diet rich in animal protein and dairy products could help relieve the symptoms of inflammatory bowel diseases.
translation: But a new study claims quite the opposite: a diet rich in meat-based protein and dairy treats could help relieve symptoms of sufferers of inflammatory bowel disease.

source: Veřejnou zakázku státní proexportní agentury CzechTrade získalo vydavatelství Mladá fronta Františka Savova.
reference: František Savova's Mladá fronta publisher won the public contract from the state pro-export agency CzechTrade.
translation: The public commission by the CzechTrade state export agency was given to František Savov's publishing house Mladá fronta.

source: Colin řekl, že když zakládal Westco „v posledním ročníku vysoké školy, Paul byl ještě malý, asi 10letý kluk.“
reference: Colin said that when he founded Westco "in his senior year of college, Paul was just a little boy, about 10 years old."
translation: Colin says he started Westco there when he was "in my final years of high school, when Paul was a young child (around 10 years old)."

source: Bílý Dům uvedl, že z peněz daňových poplatníků nebyly hrazeny žádné další rekvizity.
reference: The White House said no additional props were paid for with taxpayers' money.
translation: The White House said taxpayers did not pick up the burden for any of the other props featured at the event.

source: "Muži většinou neumí odhadnout správnou velikost a volí spíš větší," usmívá se Martin nad častou chybou.
reference: "Most men don't know how to guess the right size, and they choose bigger," Martin says, smiling at the frequent mistake.
translation: "Men usually can not guess the right size, and they usually opt for one that is too big," chuckled Martin over the frequent mistake.

source: Podivila se, že nikdo jiný jí tento příspěvek nenapsal, tak zavřela Facebook a otevřela Twitter.
reference: She wondered why no one else had written her that post, so she closed Facebook and opened Twitter.
translation: Confused, noticing no one else on her feed had posted the information, she closed Facebook and opened Twitter.

source: K trojici hráčů se na hřišti připojí také bývalý vítěz Masters Ian Woosnam a vítězové seniorských turnajů Paul Broadhurst, Roger Chapman, Mark James a Mark McNulty..
reference: The three players will also be joined on the field by former Masters winner Ian Woosnam and senior tournament winners Paul Broadhurst, Roger Chapman, Mark James and Mark McNulty.
translation: Joining the trio in the field are former Masters winner Ian Woosnam and Senior major champions Paul Broadhurst, Roger Chapman, Mark James and Mark McNulty.

source: Policie se obávala, že dav shromážděný na náměstí propadne nenávistnému šílenství, vraha popadne a zlynčuje.
reference: Police feared the crowd gathered in the square would descend into a hateful frenzy, snatching the killer and lynching him.
translation: The police were afraid that the crowd gathered in the square would succumb to hateful madness, grab the killer and lynch him.

source: Záleží na tom, jestli do startu nového ročníku získá angažmá.
reference: It depends on whether he gets an engagement before the start of the new year.
translation: It depends on whether he finds an engagement before the start of the new year.

source: Pro čtenáře, kteří přesně neví, o co jde, bude asi nejlepší, když se podívají např. na oficiální stránky kulturní památky Pietní místo Lety.
reference: For readers who don't know exactly what's going on, it's probably best to take a look, for example, at the official site of the cultural monument Pietro Place Lety.
translation: For the readers who do not know exactly what's going on, it's probably best if they look at the official cultural heritage site of Pietní místo Lety, for example.

source: Jednoho z vojáků se tato výtka a tón, kterým byla vyřčena dotkla a později se vrátil se čtyřmi dalšími vojáky, uvedl místní farář Yavedt Tebai.
reference: One of the soldiers was touched by the rebuke and the tone it was delivered, and later returned with four other soldiers, said local priest Yavedt Tebai.
translation: One of the soldiers took umbrage at their tone and later returned with four soldiers, according to local Pastor Yavedt Tebai.

source: Je vskutku zajímavé, že výstava probíhá zrovna v době, kdy Donald Trump vede válku s lidmi, kteří usilují o zveřejňování vládních informací a transgenderovými vojáky, zatímco se snaží nalézat nové způsoby, jak svými tweety podněcovat zášť v oblastech, které by měl podporovat.
reference: Indeed, it is interesting that the exhibition is taking place at a time when Donald Trump is at war with people who seek to make public government information and transgender soldiers, while trying to find new ways to stir up resentment in areas he should be encouraging with his tweets.
translation: There's also something profound and powerful about the exhibition opening now, as Donald Trump wages war on government leakers and transgender troops while finding new, tweetable ways to further inflame the stark divisions he's been called on to mend.

source: „Nelíbí se mi myšlenka, že jakmile určitý počet lidí okomentuje stejné téma, jsou některými lidmi označeni za propagaci takzvané kolektivní snahy, místo toho, aby byli uznáni za větší skupinu zainteresovaných občanů.“
reference: "I don't like the idea that once a certain number of people comment on the same subject, they are identified by some as promoting a so-called collective effort, instead of being recognized as a larger group of concerned citizens."
translation: "I also do not appreciate that idea that when a number of people comment on the same topic, they are immediately disregarded by some as a so-called collective effort, rather than recognized as a large group of concerned citizens."

source: Díky chytrému využití prostoru a skladovacím prostorům získala Joanne dalších 16 metrů čtverečních, druhý pokoj a lepší celkové rozvržení bytu.
reference: Thanks to clever use of space and storage space, Joanne got another 16 square metres, a second room and a better overall layout of the apartment.
translation: Thanks to clever use of space and storage, Joanne gained an additional 16sq m, an extra bedroom and an improved layout.

source: Jen říkám, že občané platí za veřejnoprávní rozhlas a televizi poplatky zhruba 7,2 miliardy ročně, ale vlastně nevědí, jak tyto instituce hospodaří.
reference: I'm just saying that citizens pay about 7.2 billion a year in public radio and television fees, but they don't really know how these institutions are run.
translation: I'm just saying that citizens pay about 7.2 billion a year for public radio and television fees, but they do not really know how these institutions are run.

source: Vášnivě se objímala s bývalým milencem!
reference: She was hugging her ex-lover passionately!
translation: She passionately embraced her former lover!

source: Na to se vás vůbec neptám.
reference: That's not what I'm asking you.
translation: That's not what I'm asking you about at all.

source: Ale no tak, nebuďte takoví puritáni!
reference: Oh, come on, don't be such a prude!
translation: Come on, don’t be such puritans!

source: Bratři bojují o impérium v hodnotě přes 500 milionů dolarů
reference: Brothers fight over $500 million empire
translation: Brothers fight over $500 million property empire

source: Každý z nich snáší místní vlhké podnebí téměř osm hodin a Brooks je v zástupu vede k hrobům Malcolma a Dorsey.
reference: They each endure the local humid climate for nearly eight hours, and Brooks leads them in line to the graves of Malcolm and Dorsey.
translation: They've all weathered Georgia's oppressive humidity for the nearly eight hours as Brooks lead them on a pilgrimage to the grave sites of the Malcoms and Dorseys.

source: Rana si chodívala hrát ven s ostatními dětmi ze sousedství.
reference: Rana used to go out and play with the other kids from the neighborhood.
translation: Rana had gone out to play with the other children in the neighbourhood.

source: New York s devíti miliony obyvatel má pět distriktů a 51 zastupitelů.
reference: New York, with a population of nine million, has five districts and 51 incumbents.
translation: There are nine million inhabitants in New York, which has five districts and 51 representatives.

source: V dopise stavbyvedoucímu společnosti vyjádřily skotské odbory GMB své obavy, že McVitie's „nedostane svým slibům o financování a modernizaci výrobních linek.“
reference: In a letter to the company's manager, the Scottish GMB union expressed its concern that McVitie's "will not receive its promises to fund and modernise production lines."
translation: In a letter to the company's site manager, GMB Scotland called on McVitie's to "address concerns that funding is not being brought forward for the modernisation of production lines."

source: Právě jejich seznam se vyhláškou mění.
reference: It is their list that is being amended by decree.
translation: The list of which ones is changing with the decree, however.

source: Zaměstnanci týdeníku Riodoce se pravidelně schází každou středu, aby prodiskutovali novinky ohledně nepokojů, které probíhají v oblasti Sinaloa za účasti organizovaných zločinců, zkorumpovaných úředníků a neutuchajících drogových válek.
reference: Staff of Riodoce weekly meet regularly every Wednesday to discuss the news of the riots taking place in the Sinaloa region involving organised criminals, corrupt officials and the relentless drug wars.
translation: The staff of the weekly newspaper Riodoce normally meets on Wednesdays to review their plans for coverage of the most recent mayhem wrought in Sinaloa state by organized crime, corrupt officials and ceaseless drug wars.

source: Chtěla jsem mít proces výroby pod kontrolou a také jsem chtěla vědět, z jakých materiálů a jak se Whoop.de.doo produkty vyrábí.
reference: I wanted to control the production process, and I also wanted to know what materials and how Whoop.de.doo products were made.
translation: I wanted to have control over the production process and I also wanted to know with what materials and how Whoop.de.doo products are made.

source: S nostalgií vzpomínám na doby dávno minulé, kde návod k použití čehokoliv byl spíše raritním úkazem.
reference: I am nostalgic for a time gone by, where instructions to use anything were more of a rarefied phenomenon.
translation: I look back with nostalgia on the distant past, when user instructions for anything were a rare phenomenon.

source: Tusk poděkoval za podporu a ujistil, že má čisté svědomí: "Nemám se čeho bát a Kaczyński mě nezastraší."
reference: Tusk thanked the support and assured that his conscience was clear: "I have nothing to fear, and Kaczynski will not intimidate me."
translation: Tusk thanked them for their support and assured them his conscience was clear: "I have nothing to fear, Kaczynski doesn't intimidate me."

source: K dnešnímu datu předala Švédská migrační agentura k prošetření 6880 případů a Forenzní lékařská agentura nyní zveřejnila výsledky celkem 2481 testů, uskutečněných od poloviny března do 31. července 2017.
reference: To date, the Swedish Migration Agency has referred 6880 cases for investigation and the Forensic Medical Agency has now published the results of a total of 2481 tests, carried out between mid-March and 31 July 2017.
translation: To date Migrationsverket has sent 6,880 cases to be tested, and the Forensic Medicine Agency has now released the results of a total of 2,481 tests from the period between mid March until July 31st, 2017.

source: Prvním bylo únorové vydání rozhovoru s Damaso Lopezem, vůdcem jednoho ze soupeřících drogových kartelů, které vedly válku se syny Joaquína Guzmána.
reference: The first was the February edition of an interview with Damaso Lopez, the leader of one of the rival drug cartels that waged war on the sons of Joaquín Guzmán.
translation: First there was the publication in February of an interview with Damaso Lopez, a leader of one of the rival cartel factions at war with Guzman's sons.

source: Pár byl naposledy spatřen, když si Žirnov od svého otce vypůjčil auto, aby mohl vyzvednout svou přítelkyni z práce.
reference: The couple were last seen when Zhirnov borrowed a car from his father to pick up his girlfriend from work.
translation: The couple was last seen when Zhirnov borrowed his father's car to pick his girlfriend up from work.

source: Získáme tak celkový obraz, který předneseme u soudu.'
reference: It will give us an overall picture to present in court.'
translation: This helps build a picture of the situation for the court to consider when we present our case to them.'

source: Předvolání k výslechu přišlo záhy po zvolení Tuska šéfem Evropské rady, kterému se Kaczyński usilovně, ale marně snažil zabránit, mimo jiné při návštěvě Merkelové ve Varšavě.
reference: The summons for questioning came soon after the election of Tusk as head of the European Council, whom Kaczynski tried hard but in vain to prevent, including during Merkel's visit to Warsaw.
translation: The call for questioning came shortly after Tuska was elected the President of the European Council, which Kaczynski tried to prevent in vain, including during Merkel's visit in Warsaw.

source: Podobný osud potkal Andrease Christopherose z Velké Británie, jemuž obličej poleptal kyselinou neznámý útočník, který byl nakonec zproštěn viny.
reference: A similar fate befell Andreas Christopheros of Great Britain, whose face was laced with acid by an unknown assailant, who was eventually acquitted.
translation: This is the fate that met Andreas Christopheros from Great Britain, whose face was burned with acid by an unknown attacker who was eventually acquitted.

source: Šestnáct tisíc aplaudujících fanoušků na nohou.
reference: Sixteen thousand cheering fans on their feet.
translation: Sixteen thousand fans were up on their feet applauding.

source: Australská zpravodajská služba uvedla, že bude ve spolupráci se svými mezinárodními partnery usilovat o to, aby přesně určila, odkud a kam drogy směřovaly, a aby odhalila "litevský syndikát".
reference: The Australian Intelligence Service said it would work with its international partners to determine exactly where and where the drugs were going and to uncover a "Lithuanian syndicate."
translation: The Australian intelligence service said it would work with its international partners to determine exactly where the drugs were going to and from, and to unmask the "Lithuanian syndicate".

source: Navzdor tomu, stejně jako faktu, že Valdez byl důvěrně seznámen s riziky svého zaměstnání, se Ismail Bojorquez (60), spoluzakladatel a ředitel Riodoce stále obniňuje z toho, že svého přítele neochránil.
reference: In spite of this, as well as the fact that Valdez was intimately acquainted with the risks of his employment, Ismail Bojorquez (60), Riodoce's co-founder and director, continues to lay bare the fact that he did not protect his friend.
translation: Despite that, and the fact that Valdez was intimately aware of the perils of his work, Ismail Bojorquez, 60, a co-founder and director of Riodoce, is wracked with guilt for failing to protect his friend.

source: A pokud změna nenastane rychle - v nejhorším případě vůbec - může vyvolat zklamání a nezájem zaměstnanců.
reference: And if change doesn't happen quickly - at worst, not at all - it can cause disappointment and disinterest in workers.
translation: And if change doesn't come fast enough, or at all, it can breed disappointment and make employees disengaged.

source: Tento senzační přestup rozvířil vody letních přestupů. Klub Ligue 1 je připraven překonat více než dvojnásobně předchozí rekordní částku za přestup Paula Pogby do Manchesteru United, který za něj v loňské sezóně zaplatil 89 milionů £.
reference: This sensational transfer has stirred the waters of summer transfer, with the Ligue 1 club set to surpass more than double the previous record fee for Paul Pogba's transfer to Manchester United, which paid £89 million for him last season.
translation: The sensational approach has lit up the summer transfer window, with the Ligue 1 club ready to break the world transfer record by more than double the previous mark, which saw Paul Pogba return to Manchester United last season for £89m.

source: „Měl jsem důvod o této problematice přemýšlet a nemyslím si, že tyto typy měření k posouzení věku jsou správné.
reference: "I've had reason to think about this issue, and I don't think these types of age-assessment measurements are right.
translation: "I've had reason to think about this, and I don't think the type of measurement being used should be.

source: Další dva bratři, Mark a Luke, již nejsou součástí skupiny společností rodiny De Lutis. Colin uvedl, že Mark byl při svém odchodu odškodněn částkou 10 milionů dolarů a Luke částkou 26 milionů dolarů.
reference: Two other brothers, Mark and Luke, are no longer part of the De Lutis family group of companies.
translation: Two other brothers, Mark and Luke, are no longer part of the De Lutis group of companies, with Colin saying that Mark was paid $10 million when he left the business, and Luke $26 million.

source: Třeba ve Strážnici byla čtvrteční teplota stejná jako předchozí rekord z roku 2013.
reference: Perhaps in Strážnice, Thursday's temperature was the same as the previous record from 2013.
translation: For example, in Strážnice the temperature during the day on Thurday was the same as the previous record set in 2013.

source: Podle mluvčího hasičů Ladislava Holomčíka pomáhal oheň ze vzduchu hasit i vrtulník.
reference: A helicopter also helped to extinguish the fire from the air, according to firefighter spokesman Ladislav Holomčík.
translation: According to the firefighter's spokesman Ladislav Holomcík, a helicopter helped to put out the fire from the air.

source: Herci Darrius Bradshaw a Nick Rascona, kteří hrají roli Rogera Malcoma, potažmo Barnetta Hestera, nacvičují své role.
reference: Actors Darrius Bradshaw and Nick Rascona, who play the role of Roger Malcom and, by extension, Barnett Hester, rehearse their roles.
translation: Across the room, actors Darrius Bradshaw and Nick Rascona, who play Roger Malcom and Barnett Hester, rehearsed their lines.

source: Státní zakázku CzechTrade získala firma Františka Savova, jehož stát stíhá.
reference: The state contract CzechTrade was awarded to František Savov, whose state is prosecuting.
translation: The CzechTrade national commission is won by František Savov's company, who is prosecuted by the state.

source: Kelly se nyní, o tři měsíce později snaží prosadit stejnou strategii.
reference: Kelly is now trying to pull off the same strategy three months later.
translation: Kelly is trying to do the same thing, three months later.

source: Stejně tak muži volí převážně černé prádlo, kdežto žena zpravidla tíhne spíš k růžové barvě.
reference: Similarly, men choose mostly black underwear, whereas a woman tends to tend more toward pink.
translation: Likewise, men mostly pick out black underwear, while women usually tend towards pink colours.

source: Na většině míst Moravy ale zůstanou vysoké teploty ještě v pátek a na jihovýchodě Moravy i v sobotu.
reference: But in most parts of Moravia, temperatures will remain high on Friday and in the south-east of Moravia on Saturday.
translation: However, temperatures in Moravia will mostly remain high on Friday, and also on Saturday in the southeast of Moravia.

source: Největší a nejvýdělečnější zlatý důl na světě Grasberg, který vlastní společnost Freeport McMoran z amerického Phoeenixu, se nachází pouze 60 mil od Paniai - skalnaté provincie přibližně o velikosti New Jersey, která je domovem asi 153 000 obyvatel.
reference: The world's largest and highest-earning gold mine, Grasberg, owned by Freeport McMoran of America's Phoeenix, is only 60 miles from Paniai - a rocky province about the size of New Jersey that is home to about 153,000 residents.
translation: The world's largest and most profitable gold mine, Grasberg, owned by Phoenix-based Freeport McMoran, lies just 60 miles from Paniai, a highland province around the size of New Jersey and home to 153,000 people.

source: Villarreal požádal novináře, aby napsali o dřívějších incidentech, ke kterým v restauraci došlo, včetně incidentu, při kterém jeden ze synů Joaquína „El Chapo“ Guzmána unikl armádní zásahové jednotce.
reference: Villarreal asked journalists to write about earlier incidents at the restaurant, including one in which one of the sons of Joaquín "El Chapo" Guzmán escaped an army SWAT team.
translation: Villarreal asked the reporter to write about prior incidents in that locale, including one in which a son of "El Chapo" Guzman escaped a military raid.

source: Skutečností je, že pouhé dva měsíce po říjnové inauguraci Jakowiho zažila Paniai velký šok.
reference: The fact is that just two months after Jakowi's inauguration in October, Paniai had a major shock.
translation: In fact, Paniai suffered a nadir just two months after Jokowi's October inauguration.

source: Jeden z novinářů vyčetl z veřejných záznamů, že uvedená restaurace byla registrována pod jménem, jež je spojováno s jistým politikem, který je členem Institucionální revoluční strany (PRI), ovládající všechny úrovně politické scény téměř celé minulé století.
reference: One journalist read from public records that the restaurant was registered under a name associated with a politician who is a member of the Institutional Revolutionary Party (PRI), controlling all levels of the political scene for nearly the last century.
translation: A reporter learned from public records that the restaurant was registered under the name of a politician belonging to the ruling Institutional Revolution Party, or PRI, which dominated all levels of politics for nearly all of the last century.

source: Velkou komplikací se pro Christopherose stala ztráta očních víček.
reference: A major complication for Christopheros was the loss of her eyelids.
translation: One major complication for Christopheros was the loss of his eyelids.

source: Emma Lazarus popisuje sochu z pohledu vyčerpaného a zatraceného cestujícího, který mnohdy po dlouhé a děsivé plavbě napříč oceánem přijíždí s nadějí v srdci do nové země.
reference: Emma Lazarus describes the statue from the point of view of an exhausted and damned passenger who, often after a long and terrifying voyage across the ocean, arrives with hope in his heart in a new land.
translation: Lazarus's great imaginative act was to see it as it would be seen by exhausted, wretched but hopeful people on the decks of ships after long and often dreadful journeys.

source: Vydavatelství VLM podalo proti výsledku tendru několik námitek s tím, že jeho vyhodnocení považuje nza neférové a nedostatečně zdůvodněné.
reference: The publisher of the VLM has lodged several objections to the outcome of the tender, saying that it considers its evaluation unfair and insufficiently reasoned.
translation: The VLM publishing company has issued several objections to the outcome of the tender, considering its assessment to be unfair and insufficiently substantiated.

source: Ředitel atletické federace Spojeného království Neil Black uvedl, že silná skvadra 16 Skotů v týmu Mistrovství světa bude „obrovským přínosem pro tým“.
reference: UK Athletics Director Neil Black said the strong squad of 16 Scots in the World Championship team would be a "huge asset to the team."
translation: UK Athletics' performance director Neil Black says the 16-strong Scottish contingent in the World Championships squad will make "a massive contribution to the team."

source: „Nastala panika, měli jsme strach z odplaty,“ uvedl pro TIME 29letý Dominggu Badii, který žije poblíž nemocnice a byl svědkem příjezdu zraněných.
reference: "There was panic, we were afraid of retribution," said 29-year-old Dominggu Badii to TIME, who lives near the hospital and witnessed the arrival of the wounded.
translation: "We were so panicked, we are afraid there will be revenge," 29-year-old Dominggu Badii, who lives near the hospital and witnessed the injured being hurried in, tells TIME.

source: Zatímco se Trump na začátku července v Německu účastnil summitu skupiny G-20, HMX-1 provedla 58 cvičných přistání u Bílého Domu.
reference: While Trump was attending the G-20 summit in early July in Germany, HMX-1 made 58 practice landings at the White House.
translation: When Trump was at the G-20 summit in Germany in early July, HMX-1 conducted 58 practice landings at the White House.

source: „Po pohřbení těl mě začala hledat armáda,“ řekl.
reference: "After the bodies were buried, the army started looking for me," he said.
translation: "After burying the bodies, the military came looking for me," he says.

source: Tak třeba po volbách zase vše pojede dál.
reference: Maybe after the election, things will go on.
translation: So maybe after the elections, everything will go ahead.

source: Dědek je úspěšný podnikatel a miliardář určitě není náhodou.
reference: The old man is a successful businessman, and a billionaire is certainly no accident.
translation: Dědek is a successful entrepreneur and billionaire, and certainly not by chance.

source: Podle dubajské civilní obrany se podařilo obyvatele osmdesátipatrové budovy evakuovat včas a nikdo nebyl zraněn.
reference: According to the Dubai Civil Defense, the occupants of the 80-story building were evacuated in time and no one was injured.
translation: According to the Dubai civil defences, the inhabitants of the eighty-story building were evacuated in time and no one was injured.

source: Oscar Pistorius byl převezen z věznice do nemocnice kvůli bolesti na hrudi
reference: Oscar Pistorius was taken from prison to hospital for chest pain
translation: Oscar Pistorius taken from jail to hospital with chest pains

source: „Mám z toho špatný pocit, protože to odporuje tomu, kým jsem,“ řekl Marbaugh.
reference: "I have a bad feeling about this because it contradicts who I am," Marbaugh said.
translation: "I feel dirty because this is not who I am," said Marbaugh.

source: S Trumpem se sankce neuvolňují, leč zpřísňují.
reference: With Trump, sanctions are tightening rather than relaxing.
translation: Trump has not relaxed the sanctions, but actually tightened them.

source: Přece není nic špatného na tom, když budeme debatovat o počtu poslanců.
reference: There's nothing wrong with debating the number of MPs.
translation: There is nothing wrong with debating the number of representatives.

source: Některé starší dopingové případy zůstávají nevyřešené, řada podezřelých atletů ještě nebyla vyslechnuta a v zemi stále pracují trenéři s pošramocenou pověstí.
reference: Some older doping cases remain unsolved, a number of suspected athletes have yet to be interviewed and trainers with damaged reputations are still working in the country.
translation: Some older doping cases remain unresolved, as a number of suspected athletes have not yet been heard, and coaches with a compromised reputation are still working in the country.

source: Když se mi po letech pokazilo cosi uvnitř, nabídl jsem onu listinu šamanovi, který se nebál odšroubovat zadní desku.
reference: Years later, when something inside me went wrong, I offered the paper to a shaman who wasn't afraid to unscrew the backboard.
translation: When an internal part broke years later, I offered the paper to a shaman who wasn't afraid to unscrew any panel.

source: To mě přivádí do Marylandu je guvernérovi Larrymu Hoganovi, kterým potřebuje zapracovat na tom, aby se začal chovat jako Washington.
reference: That brings me to Maryland is Governor Larry Hogan, who needs to work on starting to act like Washington.
translation: That brings me to Maryland Gov. Larry Hogan, who needs to work on being more like Washington.

source: Pro program na záchranu pand jde o obrovský úspěch.
reference: This is a huge success for the panda rescue programme.
translation: The panda rescue programme is a huge success.

source: Jeden můj přítel říká, že návody k použití čte jen srab.
reference: A friend of mine says only a coward reads the instructions.
translation: One of my friends says that only quitters read user instructions.

source: Fanoušci opět přišli ve velkém počtu, ale odcházeli v rozpacích.
reference: The fans came again in large numbers, but they left embarrassed.
translation: The fans came back in large numbers, but when they left they were embarrassed.

source: "Tři soudci nakonec dospěli k závěru, že trest by měl být zrušen, neboť muž není považován za hrozbu pro veřejnost," uvedl Christopheros.
reference: "The three judges ultimately concluded that the sentence should be lifted as the man is not considered a threat to the public," said Christopheros.
translation: "Three judges eventually concluded that the sentence should be abolished because the man was not considered to be a threat to the public," said Christopheros.

source: „Pochopila jsem však, že abych mohla dělat tuhle práci a polidštit černochy, musím se otevřít.“
reference: "But I understood that in order to do this job and humanize black people, I had to open up."
translation: "But I understood that with doing this work and humanizing black folks, there has to be a level of vulnerability."

source: Šli tedy od sebe, ale přáteli zůstali dodnes.
reference: So they went apart, but remained friends to this day.
translation: They separated back then, but remain friends to this day.

source: Schůzka se koná necelé dva měsíce po jeho smrti; novináři hovoří o vzájemných traumatech, nočních můrách, nespavosti a paranoi.
reference: The meeting comes less than two months after his death; journalists talk about mutual traumas, nightmares, insomnia, and paranoia.
translation: The workshop takes place less than two months after his death; the reporters discuss their shared trauma, their nightmares, insomnia, paranoia.

source: Kbelík v místnosti bez střechy supluje toaletu.
reference: A bucket in a roofless room replaces a toilet.
translation: A bucket in a roofless room serves as a latrine.

source: Další více než stovka českých úřadů dostane hlasovací lístek ve verzi pro tisk.
reference: More than a hundred Czech authorities will receive a ballot paper in the press release.
translation: More than one hundred Czech authorities will receive a ballot sheet to be printed.

source: My jen potřebujeme tým, který bude ve vládě pracovat pro lidi, ne pro svoje partaje nebo resorty.
reference: We just need a team that works for the people in government, not for their parties or resorts.
translation: We just need a team in government that will work for the people, not for their parties or departments.

source: Organizace Foundation for Responsible Robotics (FRR) nedávno vydala prohlášení o vývoji sexuálních robotů v rámci příštích pěti až deseti letech.
reference: The Foundation for Responsible Robotics (FRR) recently issued a statement on the development of sex robots within the next five to ten years.
translation: Recently, the Foundation for Responsible Robotics (FRR) released a report looking at the development of sex robots over the next five to 10 years.

source: Před příjezdem křesťanů místní obyvatelé uctívali boha jménem Uga Tamee.
reference: Before the arrival of the Christians, the locals worshipped a god named Uga Tamee.
translation: Before Christian missionaries arrived, Mee Pago Papuans worshiped a God named Uga Tamee.

source: Právě to ji ve výsledku posunulo před dalšího kandidáta, vydavatelství Vltava Labe Media VLM, které přitom nabídlo lepší cenu.
reference: This, in effect, put it ahead of the next candidate, Vltava Labe Media VLM, which offered a better price in the process.
translation: It was this result that put it ahead of the second-best candidate, the Vltava Labe Media VLM publishing house, which offered a better price.

source: Vejce z Belgie byla podle veterinární správy na českém trhu naposledy v dubnu a vejce z Nizozemska naposledy v květnu.
reference: Eggs from Belgium were last on the Czech market in April and eggs from the Netherlands last in May, according to the veterinary administration.
translation: Eggs from Belgium were last seen in the Czech Republic in April, and eggs from the Netherlands were last imported in May.

source: Lomačenko obhajuje v sobotu v 19: 00svůj titul proti Migueli Marriagaovi na ESPN.
reference: Lomachenko defends his title against Miguel Marriaga on ESPN at 7:00 p.m. on Saturday.
translation: Lomachenko defends his belt against Miguel Marriaga on Saturday night at 7 on ESPN.

source: Zahrnutí automobilky Audi do vyšetřování může mít neblahý dopad na Volkswagen: luxusní výrobce automobilů tvoří nepoměrný podíl ze zisku Volkswagenu.
reference: Including Audi in the investigation may have a knock-on effect on Volkswagen: luxury car makers make up a disproportionate share of Volkswagen's profits.
translation: The inclusion of Audi in the investigation could weigh heavily on Volkswagen: The luxury carmaker accounts for a disproportionate share of Volkswagen's profit.

source: Americký svaz pro občanské svobody (ACLU) vydal cestovní doporučení pro Texas a Arizonu poté, co státy schválily imigrační zákon, jež umožňuje státním činitelům zadržet lidi na základě porušení tohoto zákona, který má podle ACLU zlepšit rasovou profilaci.
reference: The American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU) issued travel recommendations for Texas and Arizona after states passed an immigration law allowing state officials to detain people for violations of the law, which the ACLU says is intended to improve racial profiling.
translation: Previously, the American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU) had issued travel advisories for Texas and Arizona after the states passed immigration enforcement laws requiring local law enforcement to detain people on immigration violations which the ACLU said would increase racial profiling.

source: Když oficiální delegace z Nizozemska, v čele s vyslancem pro lidská práva Keesem Van Baarem, navštívila 4. května Jayapurau, místní lidé provolávali podle zdroje, který se také zúčastnil zasedání, ale chtěl zůstat v anonymitě, heslo „chceme svobodu“.
reference: When an official delegation from the Netherlands, headed by human rights envoy Kees Van Baar, visited Jayapurau on May 4, local people cheered the slogan "we want freedom," according to a source who also attended the meeting but wanted to remain anonymous.
translation: When an official delegation from the Netherlands, headed by the nation's human rights ambassador Kees Van Baar, visited Jayapura on May 4, local people broke their silence, beseeching, "We want freedom," according to a source who also attended the meeting but who asked to stay anonymous.

source: Společnosti si začínají uvědomovat, že je nutné dbát na kulturu pracovního prostředí - pro případ, že by se z nich stal další Uber - který se zmítá ve skandálech poté, co bývalý zaměstnanec zveřejnil na svém blogu příspěvek popisující firemní prostředí a obtěžování zaměstnanců, kteří se odváží mluvit otevřeně.
reference: Companies are beginning to recognize the need to heed the culture of the work environment - in case they become the next Uber - which is mired in scandals after a former employee published a post on his blog describing the corporate environment and harassment of employees who dare to speak freely.
translation: Companies are coming to realize they must stay on top of their workplace culture, lest they become the next Uber, which has been enmeshed in scandal since a former employee published a blog post describing an environment of harassment where those who spoke out were punished.

source: V sázce je mnoho.
reference: The stakes are high.
translation: And a lot is at stake.

source: "A navíc ztrácí pocit žízně, takže senioři obecně přijímají méně tekutin a velmi rychle se dehydratují," řekla Mádlová.
reference: 'Plus, they lose the feeling of thirst, so seniors generally take less fluids and dehydrate very quickly,' said Madi.
translation: "And they also lose their sense of thirst, so seniors generally drink less fluids and become dehydrated very quickly," said Mádlová.

source: V jiném videu držel jiný policista, jak uvedla, v ruce zbraň, se kterou mířil na dav a řval: „Všechny vás zabiju... zvířata.“
reference: In another video, another officer, she said, was holding a gun he was pointing at a crowd, yelling, "I'm going to kill you all ... animals."
translation: In another video, a different cop, she said, cocked his rifle and screamed, "I'll kill all you ... animals."

source: A jsou dálnice v Česku vůbec dokončitelné?
reference: Are the highways in the Czech Republic even finished?
translation: Can the motorways in the Czech Republic ever be finished?

source: Neumím si představit ani to, ale rozhodnou voliči.
reference: I can't even imagine that, but the voters will decide.
translation: I cannot imagine it, but the voters will decide.

source: Téměř okamžitě se ale začaly ozývat výmluvy.
reference: Almost immediately, however, there were excuses.
translation: But the excuses started almost immediately.

source: Ministerští úředníci poznamenali, že je proto třeba se soustředit na podporu co nejširší množiny schopností, nejen těch vojenských.
reference: Ministry officials noted that the focus should therefore be on supporting the widest possible range of capabilities, not just military ones.
translation: Ministry clerks noted that it was therefore necessary to focus on supporting the widest possible range of capabilities, and not just military skills.

source: „Dnes vám po dlouhé modlitbě a rozmýšlení oznamuji... dnes vám jako obyvatel Západní Virginie říkám, že vás nemohu již nadále podporovat z pozice demokratického guvernéra.“
reference: "Today, after much prayer and deliberation, I tell you... today, as a resident of West Virginia, I can no longer support you as a Democratic governor."
translation: "Today I will tell you with lots of prayers and lots of thinking ... today I will tell you as West Virginians, I can't help you anymore being a Democratic governor."

source: Deborah Goldová, výkonná ředitelka NAT (National Aids Trust) řekla: ‚Jsme svědky rozhodujícího momentu v boji proti HIV.
reference: Deborah Gold, Executive Director of the NAT (National Aids Trust) said: 'We are witnessing a decisive moment in the fight against HIV.
translation: Deborah Gold, chief executive at NAT (National Aids Trust), said: 'This is a pivotal moment in the fight against HIV.

source: Rozhodně ale nejde do politiky proto, že by si chtěl osobně polepšit.
reference: But he's certainly not going into politics because he wants to do better personally.
translation: He certainly is not going into politics because he wants to improve himself personally.

source: "Jednoho dne ten starý člověk řekne, že nemůže vstát z postele, mluví zmateně," dodala.
reference: "One day the old man says he can't get out of bed, he sounds confused," she added.
translation: "One day, the old man says he can't get out of bed, and starts talking in a confused way," she added.

source: Policisté se orientovali podle toho, ze kterého směru vycházelo její volání o pomoc.
reference: The cops were oriented by which direction her call for help was coming from.
translation: The police officers orientated themselves according to the direction of her call for help.

source: Předsedkyně Loudoun County Board of Supervisors porušila podle okresního soudce Jamese C. Cacherise první dodatek v Alexandrii, kde zamezila přístupu jednoho z voličů na její Facebook stránky.
reference: The president of the Loudoun County Board of Supervisors violated the First Amendment in Alexandria, according to District Judge James C. Cacheris, where she barred access to her Facebook page by one of her constituents.
translation: The chair of the Loudoun County Board of Supervisors violated the First Amendment, according to U.S. District Judge James C. Cacheris in Alexandria, when she banned a constituent from her Facebook page.

source: Ministerstvo zahraničních věcí uvedlo pro bTV, že bulharští turisté byli později propuštěni.
reference: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs said to bTV that the Bulgarian tourists were later released.
translation: The ministry of foreign affairs reported bTV that Bulgarians were later released.

source: Škoda 645 milionů korun vznikla jen za období od ledna do července 2008, celkový únik podle znalce převyšoval miliardu.
reference: The damage amounted to CZK 645 million between January and July 2008 alone, with total leakage exceeding CZK 1 billion, according to the expert.
translation: The damages of 645 million Czech crowns only refer to the period from January to July 2008, and according to an expert the total evasion exceeded one billion.

source: Odborníci na bezpečnost napsali na černou tabuli tři prostá slova: protivníci, neutrální a spojenci.
reference: Security experts wrote three simple words on the black board: adversaries, neutrals, and allies.
translation: Security experts have written three words on a blackboard at the front of the room: adversaries, neutrals, allies.

source: V minulosti byl Savov spojován i s vyvedením majetku z někdejšího Socialistického svazu mládeže.
reference: In the past, Savov was also associated with the expulsion of assets from the former Socialist Youth League.
translation: In the past Savov was also associated with the seizing of property from the former Socialist Youth Organisation.

source: V letošních volbách vůbec poprvé předává jedna demokraticky zvolená vláda svou moc pokojně následující vládě.
reference: In this year's elections, for the first time ever, one democratically elected government is handing over its power peacefully to the next.
translation: This year's elections mark the first time power is handed peacefully from one democratically elected government to the next.

source: „To je v pořádku,“ šeptá jedna z žen.
reference: "It's all right," whispers one of the women.
translation: "It's okay," one of the women whispers.

source: Jeho účast na projektu zainteserovala také Ferrellovou a spolu s dalšími šesti místními obyvateli, které sledoval tým „Whose Streets?“ v letech následujících po zavraždění Browna.
reference: His participation in the project also integrated Ferrell and, along with six other local residents, who were tracked by the "Whose Streets?" team in the years following Brown's assassination.
translation: His involvement endeared Ferrell to the project, along with six other locals the "Whose Streets?" team followed in the years after Brown's shooting.

source: Výzkumníci, jejichž nejnovější zjištění byla zveřejněna v časopise Current Biology, věří, že tělo Borealopelta bylo vyplaveno do moře poté, co byl mumifikován v bahně.
reference: The researchers, whose most recent findings were published in the journal Current Biology, believe the body of Borealopelt was washed into the sea after being mummified in mud.
translation: The scientists, whose latest findings appear in the journal Current Biology, believe Borealopelta was washed out to sea after it died and mummified in mud.

source: "Myslím si, že i tam by se mělo postupně zavést, aby mohli dostávat podkožní infuze," řekla.
reference: "I think it should be phased in there, too, so they can get subcutaneous infusions," she said.
translation: "I think subcutaneous infusions should be gradually introduced there too," she said.

source: Andreas se zvedl, že půjde otevřít.
reference: Andreas got up to answer the door.
translation: Andreas got up to open it.

source: Dle spisů FBI, které získalo zpravodajství NBC News, se lynčování mělo zúčastnit až 50 mužů z Monroe a okolních okresů.
reference: According to FBI files obtained by NBC News, up to 50 men from Monroe and surrounding counties were expected to participate in the lynching.
translation: According to FBI files obtained by NBC News, more than 50 men from Monroe and the surrounding counties were suspected in the lynching.

source: V rozhovoru z 5. června pro týdeník TIME, který se konal v Jakartě, však Wiranto tvrdil, že neplánuje v Papui zavádět žádná opatření.
reference: But in a June 5 interview with TIME, held in Jakarta, Wiranto maintained that he did not plan to impose any measures in Papua.
translation: Then Wiranto backtracked when speaking to TIME in Jakarta on June 5, saying he has no plans to establish a grievance mechanism in Papua.

source: Unikátní pivovar znovu vaří pivo.
reference: The unique brewery is making beer again.
translation: Unique brewery brews beer once again.

source: Samotné Nizozemsko už kvůli incidentu dočasně uzavřelo 180 drůbežáren.
reference: The Netherlands itself has already temporarily closed 180 poultry farms due to the incident.
translation: The Netherlands alone has temporarily closed 180 poultry farms because of the incident.

source: Často chodil do baru El Guayabo naproti kancelářím a sedával u stejného stolu.
reference: He often went to the El Guayabo bar across from the offices and sat at the same table.
translation: He would go to El Guayabo, the bar across from the office, and would always sit at the same table.

source: Dožívají pak většinou u svých psovodů.

French voters are inundated with an avalanche of fake news about the presidential election in May, and Germany plans to fine the social media network in advance of the September elections if it does not promptly remove angry posts.

source: Algoritmickou analýzou DNA Manningové a využitím 30 portrétů ke znázornění toho, jak by vypadal člověk s tímto genotypem, stvořila Dewey-Hagborgová břitký, ne-li intelektuální komentář o poddajnosti DNA - stejně jako o mnoha způsobech, jakými lze DNA interpretovat - a neodmyslitelném determinizmu těchto interpretací, stejně jako identity.
reference: By algorithmically analyzing Manning's DNA and using 30 portraits to represent what a person with this genotype would look like, Dewey-Hagborg created a razor-sharp, if not intellectual, commentary on the pliability of DNA - as well as the many ways DNA can be interpreted - and the inherent determinism of these interpretations, as well as identity.
translation: By algorithmically analyzing DNA extracted from Manning and using it to create 30 portraits of what someone with that genomic data might look like, Dewey-Hagborg has created a trenchant, if somewhat cerebral, commentary on not only the malleability of DNA data - the many ways it can be interpreted, and the inherent determinism of those interpretations - but also identity.
