source: Tato iterace příběhu je nostalgická jak pro postavy ze slavných 80. let; tak pro špinavá 90. léta (kdy géniové David Wain a Michael Showalter uvedli na MTV komediální skeč „The State“); a samozřejmě i pro moderní dobu, konkrétně rok 2001, než se hvězdy jako Elizabeth Banksová, Amy Poehlerová a Paul Rudd rozutekly k větším projektům.
reference: This iteration of the story is nostalgic for both the characters of the famous 1980s; the sordid 1990s (when geniuses David Wain and Michael Showalter put a comedy sketch called "The State" on MTV); and, of course, for modern times, namely 2001, before stars like Elizabeth Banks, Amy Poehler, and Paul Rudd fled to bigger projects.
translation: So this iteration of the story is simultaneously nostalgic for the characters' '80s glory days; for the '90s grunge era (around when the masterminds David Wain and Michael Showalter made the sketch comedy "The State" for MTV); and for itself - that is, for 2001, before its stars, like Elizabeth Banks, Amy Poehler and Paul Rudd, went on to bigger things.

source: Trump již dříve slíbil lidem na shromáždění v Západní Virginii důležité oznámení.
reference: Trump had earlier promised people at a rally in West Virginia an important announcement.
translation: Mr. Trump promised earlier a big announcement at the West Virginia rally.

source: Tropické teploty přidělaly práci také pražským záchranářům.
reference: Tropical temperatures have also put Prague's rescue workers to work.
translation: The tropical temperatures also created work for rescuers in Prague.

source: Uložený trest je na horní hranici zákonné sazby, což podle verdiktu odpovídá vzniklé škodě.
reference: The sentence imposed is at the upper limit of the statutory rate, which according to the verdict is equivalent to the damage suffered.
translation: The penalty imposed is in the higher end of the statutory limitations, which corresponds to the damage incurred according to the verdict.

source: Pro Scotneyho je to však zvláštní místo.
reference: But it is a special place for Scotney.
translation: But Scotney holds a special place for him.

source: Hlasování v dějišti světového šampionátu, který začne v pátek, dopadlo podle očekávání velmi jednoznačně.
reference: The vote at the stage of the world championships, which begin on Friday, turned out very unequivocally, as expected.
translation: The result vote regarding the world championships, which begin on Friday, was unambiguous, as expected.

source: Banka Anglie by měla podle očekávání oznámit, že úroková sazba zůstane nezměněna, následujíc nevýrazný ekonomický růst a oslabení inflace, která přidusila spekulace o prudkém růstu.
reference: The Bank of England is expected to announce that the interest rate will remain unchanged, followed by lacklustre economic growth and weakening inflation, which has stifled speculation of a surge in growth.
translation: The Bank of England is expected to announce later that interest rates will remain unchanged after lacklustre economic growth and easing inflation dampened speculation over a hike.

source: Jeden ze svědků televiznímu kanálu SIC Noticias řekl, že letadlo před přistáním letělo těsně nad lidmi, kteří se na pláži opalovali.
reference: One of the witnesses told the SIC Noticias television channel that the plane had been flying just over people sunbathing on the beach before landing.
translation: One witness told the SIC Noticias TV channel that the plane landed just above people who were sunbathing on the beach.

source: „K většině násilných činů došlo již dávno.
reference: "Most acts of violence took place long ago.
translation: "Most of the violations occurred a long time ago.

source: Stát Massachusetts nemá platný zákon, který by postihoval osobu napomáhající k sebevraždě druhé osoby. Tento případ tedy zakládá právní precedens.
reference: The state of Massachusetts does not have a law in place to sanction a person aiding and abetting the suicide of another person, so this case sets a legal precedent.
translation: The case appears to set a legal precedent, as there is no Massachusetts law that criminalises telling a person to commit suicide.

source: Ale i tak vnímám z pohledu výše uvedených skutečností heslo lídra hnutí ANO jen jako prázdné předvolební proklamace.
reference: But even so, from the perspective of the above, I see the 'yes' leader's slogan only as an empty campaign proclamation.
translation: However, given the aforementioned facts, I feel that the leader of the ANO movement is only using it as an empty pre-election proclamation.

source: To by nemělo být tak obtížné.
reference: That shouldn't be too difficult.
translation: This shouldn't be so hard.

source: Ve městě se podle Brookse tradovalo, že Hester obcoval s Malcomovou ženou Dorothy a přivedl ji do jiného stavu.
reference: In town, according to Brooks, it was said that Hester had made love to Malcom's wife, Dorothy, and got her pregnant.
translation: Brooks said the town rumor was that Hester had been sleeping with Malcom's wife, Dorothy, and that the baby she was carrying was not her husband's.

source: A ono se vlastně nechumelí.
reference: And it doesn't really wash.
translation: At it really doesn't.

source: Kromě Pardubického kraje už má také hotové všechny kandidátky.
reference: Apart from the Pardubice region, she also has all the candidates ready.
translation: Except for the Pardubice Region, all the candidates have already been prepared.

source: Svou účast v Pohlreichově nové show myslí opravdu vážně.
reference: He's really serious about participating in Pohlreich's new show.
translation: He's taking his participation in Pohlreich's new show very seriously.

source: Tak to nemůže fungovat.
reference: That can't work.
translation: It can't work that way.

source: Díky novým roamingovým pravidlům má většina českých cestovatelů v zahraničí k dispozici více dat v rámci paušálu než doma.
reference: Thanks to the new roaming rules, most Czech travellers abroad have more data available on a flat-rate basis than at home.
translation: Thanks to the new roaming rules, most Czech travellers abroad can access more data as part of their normal rate at home.

source: Glint získal v listopadu 10 milionů $ od Bessemer Venture Partners a v průběhu celé kampaně získal 60 milionů $.
reference: Glint raised $10 million from Bessemer Venture Partners in November and raised $60 million throughout the campaign.
translation: Glint secured $10 million in November from Bessemer Venture Partners, bringing its total funding to $60 million.

source: Rozhodnutí o zachování stávajícího stavu přišlo poté, co zklamavší nárůst pohřbil naděje na další růst - HDP se zastavil na 0,3 % ve druhém kvartálu oproti 0,2 % z předchozích tří měsíců.
reference: The decision to maintain the status quo came after a disappointing increase buried hopes of further growth - GDP stalled at 0.3% in the second quarter, up from 0.2% in the previous three months.
translation: The no-change decision comes after recent disappointing growth figures have dampened mounting expectations of a hike, with GDP edging up to 0.3% in the second quarter from 0.2% in the previous three months.

source: Za peníze získané zastavěním majetku koupili nemovitost v Collingwoodu, kde Colin otevřel první rodinný podnik s džíny.
reference: With the money raised by mortgaging the property, they bought a property in Collingwood, where Colin opened the family's first jeans business.
translation: They used the collateral to buy the Collingwood property where Colin opened the family's first jeans store.

source: Jednotka helikoptéry ve stejný den nalétala v rámci „neprezidentských podpůrných misí“ dalších jedenáct hodin.
reference: The helicopter unit flew an additional eleven hours in "non-presidential support missions" on the same day.
translation: Unit helicopters also flew an additional 11 hours that day for "non-presidential support missions."

source: K nehodě došlo na pláži Praia de São João v oblasti Costa da Caparica, zhruba 30 kilometrů jižně od Lisabonu.
reference: The accident took place on Praia de São João beach in the Costa da Caparica area, some 30 kilometres south of Lisbon.
translation: The accident occurred at Praia de São João Beach in the Costa da Caparica region, about 30 kilometres south of Lisbon.

source: Toto rozhodnutí přišlo rok poté, co byly minulý rok v srpnu sazby sníženy na 0,025 % v odpověď na šokující hlasování o referendu EU, což zapříčinilo pokles libry.
reference: This decision came a year after rates were cut to 0.025% last August in response to the shock EU referendum vote, which caused the pound to fall.
translation: The decision comes a year after rates were cut to 0.25% last August following the shock EU referendum vote, which sent the pound slumping.

source: V rámci současné tříletého zkušebního období, které skončí v roce 2018, mohou kluby vykázat ztrátu do výše 30 milionů EUR.
reference: Under the current three-year trial period, which ends in 2018, clubs can report a loss of up to EUR 30 million.
translation: During the current three-year FFP assessment period that runs through 2018, clubs can incur losses of 30 million euros.

source: Původně ji mělo tvořit až dvanáct bunkrů spojených rozsáhlým podzemím.
reference: It was originally intended to be made up of as many as twelve bunkers connected by large underground sites.
translation: Originally, it should have been formed of up to 12 bunkers connected by a cavernous underground area.

source: Klimatizovány jsou kromě kabin některé tramvaje i v prostoru pro cestující.
reference: In addition to the cabins, some trams are air-conditioned in the passenger compartment.
translation: In addition to the cabins, the passenger compartments of some trams are also air conditioned.

source: Na schůzce s guvernérem Sinaloy, která se konala den po vraždě Valdeze, Ramirezová obvinila úřady ze sledování novinářů a jejich vraždy za hlásání pravdy.
reference: At a meeting with the Sinaloa governor the day after Valdez's murder, Ramirez accused the authorities of stalking journalists and murdering them for telling the truth.
translation: At a meeting with the governor of Sinaloa the day after Valdez was killed, Ramirez accused authorities of spying on journalists and having them killed for telling the truth.

source: Náklady na soudní stání stoupají. Stovky stránek místopřísežných prohlášení, e-maily a zprávy od společností, včetně Deloitte, Pitcher Partners a Charter Keck Cramer zaplavují advokáty, včetně Allana Myerse, QC a obhájců obou stran.
reference: Hundreds of pages of affidavits, emails and reports from companies including Deloitte, Pitcher Partners and Charter Keck Cramer are flooding with attorneys, including Allan Myers, QC, and attorneys for both sides.
translation: Costs are mounting in the case, with hundreds of pages of affidavits, emails and reports by companies including Deloitte, Pitcher Partners and Charter Keck Cramer filed and top barristers including Allan Myers, QC, and senior solicitors retained by both sides.

source: Jak společnost zdůraznila, směrnice TSA jsou poněkud komplikované a matoucí.
reference: As the company has stressed, the TSA directives are somewhat complicated and confusing.
translation: As the company points out, however, the TSA guidelines are somewhat complicated and confusing.

source: Cítím, že kdybych ji před touto zkušeností ochránila, jen bych jí uškodila.“
reference: I feel that to protect her from this experience would only harm her."
translation: I feel like I would be doing her a disservice to shield her from that."

source: Kliniky sexuálního zdraví v Londýně, Brightonu, Manchesteru, Liverpool a Sheffieldu budou mezi prvními, které začnou přijímat pacienty. Další kliniky se připojí v říjnu a do dubna 2018 dojde k úplné implementaci napříč celou Anglií.
reference: Sexual health clinics in London, Brighton, Manchester, Liverpool and Sheffield will be among the first to start accepting patients, with more clinics joining in October and full implementation across England by April 2018.
translation: Sexual health clinics in London, Brighton, Manchester, Liverpool and Sheffield will be among the first to start enrolling people, with more clinics joining in October before full implementation across England by April 2018.

source: Já i moje žena Jamileh jsme vděčni, že spravedlnost byla vykonána.
reference: My wife Jamileh and I are grateful that justice has been done.
translation: Both my wife Jamileh and I are grateful that justice has been done.

source: Po Strážnici bylo největší vedro v Dyjákovicích na Znojemsku a Brodě nad Dyjí na Břeclavsku, kde se shodně vyšplhala rtuť na 37,8 stupně, ale rekord nepřekonala.
reference: After Strážnice, the biggest heat was in Dyjákovice on Znojemsk and Broda nad Dyji on Břeclavsk, where the mercury consistently climbed to 37.8 degrees, but did not break the record.
translation: After Straznice, the biggest heat was in Dyjakovice, near Znojmo, and Brod nad Dyje, near Břeclav, where the mercury climbed to 37.8 degrees, but did not beat the record.

source: „Mladí lidé se stěhují z vesnic kvůli nedostatku pracovních příležitosti a peněz,“ řekl John Gobai, předseda kmenové rady Paniai.
reference: "Young people are moving out of villages because of a lack of job opportunities and money," said John Gobai, chairman of the Paniai tribal council.
translation: "The young people are not interested to stay in the village ... because there's no jobs or money here," says John Gobai, the chairman of the tribal council of Paniai.

source: Proč se Sparta nedokázala dostat tak dlouho do zápasu?
reference: Why couldn't Sparta get this far into the match?
translation: Why did it take Sparta so long to come into the match?

source: Bývalý francouzský hráč věřil, že kluby, které se v honbě za novými posilami zadluží, v konečném důsledku podvádějí a riskují bankrot, pokud je banky nebo majitelé odmítnou zajistit.
reference: The former French player believed that clubs that went into debt in pursuit of new reinforcements ultimately cheated and risked bankruptcy if banks or owners refused to provide them.
translation: The former France player believed that clubs who ran up huge debts in their pursuit of success were effectively cheating and risking ruin if banks or owners withdrew their support.

source: Peking kvůli vízové politice přichází o miliardy.
reference: Beijing is losing billions over visa policy.
translation: Beijing is losing billions because of the national visa policies.

source: Britský vynálezce používá mikročip ve své ruce k odemykání auta a domu mávnutím
reference: British inventor uses microchip in his hand to unlock car and house with a wave
translation: British inventor microchips himself to get into house and car with a wave of hand

source: Evakuováni byli všichni obyvatelé budovy a nedošlo k žádným zraněním. Příčina požáru není známa.
reference: All residents of the building were evacuated and there were no injuries.
translation: The building was evacuated, no injuries were reported, and there was no immediate word on the cause of the blaze.

source: Součástí areálu je kromě pěchotního srubu T-S 73 s expozicí a podzemím i vyzbrojený objekt lehkého opevnění, dále dva rozestavěné pěchotní sruby, zákopy a naučná stezka Opevněné Trutnovsko.
reference: The compound includes, in addition to the T-S 73 infantry cabin with its exposition and underground, a lightweight fortification facility, as well as two spaced infantry cabins, trenches and the educational trail of the Fortified Trutnovsko.
translation: In addition to the T-S 73 infantry cabin with an exhibition and the underground area, there is also an armed light fortification building, two deployed infantry cabins, trenches and a nature trail by "Opevněné Trutnovsko".

source: Členové výboru také hlasovali za stažení části mamutího balíčku, jehož úkolem bylo podpořit ekonomiku, a který byl zaveden do praxe před rokem jako odpověď na Brexit.
reference: Committee members also voted to withdraw part of a mammoth package designed to boost the economy, which was put into practice a year ago in response to Brexit.
translation: Members also voted to withdraw part of the mammoth economy-boosting package unleashed a year ago in the aftermath of Brexit.

source: Místopředseda komentoval druhou část plánu WADA směřující k vyhovění kodexu - který popisuje kritéria pro obnovení platnosti RUSADA - jež byl nedávno zveřejněn na webových stránkách organizace.
reference: The Vice-President commented on the second part of WADA's plan to comply with the code - which describes the criteria for RUSADA's reinstatement - which was recently published on the organisation's website.
translation: The PM was commenting on the second part of WADA's Roadmap to Code Compliance, which describes the criteria for the reinstatement of RUSADA and which recently published on the organization's website.

source: V místnosti, kde se schází zaměstnanci Riodoce, nejsou povoleny žádné mobilní telefony; před několika dny byl totiž objeven spyware, který si kupovali vlády k monitorování mexických novinářů a aktivistů.
reference: No cell phones are allowed in the room where Riodoce employees meet; indeed, spyware was discovered a few days ago, bought by governments to monitor Mexican journalists and activists.
translation: In the room where Riodoce staff met for security training, suddenly no cellphones were allowed; days before, it was revealed that spyware sold exclusively to governments had been used to monitor journalists and activists in Mexico.

source: To znamená hrát víc dozadu, víc bojovat.
reference: That means playing more back, fighting more.
translation: That means playing more towards the rear, fighting more.

source: Když už Dědek vstupuje do politiky, mohl si alespoň nastudovat pravidla hry.
reference: Now that Old Man was entering politics, he could at least study the rules of the game.
translation: When Dědek entered politics, he could at least have studied the rules of the game.

source: RUSADA už nicméně může pod supervizí zahraničních expertů a Britské antidopingové agentury provádět testování.
reference: Nevertheless, RUSADA can already conduct testing under the supervision of foreign experts and the UK Anti-Doping Agency.
translation: However, RUSADA may undergo testing under the supervision of foreign experts and the British Anti-Doping Agency.

source: Dehydratace se projeví jako naprostá ztráta soběstačnosti.
reference: Dehydration will manifest as a complete loss of self-sufficiency.
translation: Dehydration manifests itself as a complete loss of self-sufficiency.

source: Pravicová opozice poté oznámila, že zákon napadne u soudu, protože podle ní porušuje právo nenarozeného dítěte na život.
reference: The right-wing opposition then announced that it would challenge the law in court, saying it violated the unborn child's right to life.
translation: The right-wing opposition then announced that it would appeal the law would at court, on the grounds that it violated the unborn child's right to live.

source: Stejně jako Matić, i jeho noví spoluhráči Victor Lindelöf a Romelu Lukaku také odehráli první zápas na Aviva Stadium a Mourinho začíná pomalu formovat svou jedenáctku pro další sezónu.
reference: Like Matic, his new team-mates Victor Lindelöf and Romelu Lukaku have also played their first match at the Aviva Stadium and Mourinho is slowly shaping his 11 for the next season.
translation: As well as Matic, fellow new signings Victor Lindelof and Romelu Lukaku also started the game at the Aviva Stadium as Mourinho started to shape his starting XI for the start of the season.

source: Na Rusko přicházejí sankce za to, že se příliš montuje tam, kam nemá.
reference: Sanctions are coming to Russia for over-assembling where it shouldn't.
translation: Russia is penalised for meddling where it shouldn't.

source: O několik hodin později někdo podpálil nedalekou budovu volební komise a následujícího dne se věci ještě vystupňovaly.
reference: A few hours later, someone set fire to a nearby election commission building, and things escalated the next day.
translation: A couple of hours later, the nearby government Election Commission building was set ablaze, and things escalated the following day.

source: "Mrzí mě, že zákonodárci podali stížnost k Ústavnímu soudu a že teď bude deset lidí rozhodovat o tom, na čem jsme se dohadovali v parlamentu více než dva roky," postěžovala si socialistická senátorka Isabel Allendeová.
reference: "I am sorry that the legislators have filed a complaint with the Constitutional Court and that now ten people will decide what we argued about in parliament for more than two years," complained Socialist Senator Isabel Allende.
translation: "I am sorry that the lawmakers filed a complaint with the Constitutional Court, so that now there will be ten people deciding on what we have been arguing about in parliament for more than two years," complained Socialist Senator Isabel Allende.

source: Nizozemský úřad dohlížející na bezpečnost potravin NVWA podle agentury Reuters oznámil, že vyšetřuje 20 procent všech nizozemských drůbežáren, což podle něj znamená, že 80 procent vajec na trhu je nezávadných.
reference: The Dutch food safety authority NVWA told Reuters that it was investigating 20 percent of all Dutch poultry farms, which it said meant that 80 percent of the eggs on the market were safe.
translation: According to Reuters, NVWA, the Netherlands's Food Safety Authority, has examined 20 percent of all Dutch poultry, which they claim means that 80 percent of the eggs on the market are acceptable.

source: Texas a další státy zase přijaly zákony, podle kterých náboženské charitativní organizace, jež od matek dostaly děti po narození k adopci, nemají povinnost tyto děti k adopcím poskytnout stejnopohlavním párům.
reference: Texas and other states have passed laws under which religious charities that received children for adoption from their mothers after birth are not required to provide those children for adoption to same-sex couples.
translation: Texas and other states have in turn adopted laws under which religious charities that are given children for adoption by their mothers are not required to give these children to same-sex couples.

source: Dva bratři se nyní, více než čtyři dekády po založení impéria jejich italskou rodinou, přetahují o jednu z nejdražších viktoriánských nemovitostí v hodnotě přesahující 500 milionů dolarů.
reference: Two brothers are now, more than four decades after the empire was founded by their Italian family, vying for one of the most expensive Victorian properties worth more than $500 million.
translation: Two brothers are at war over one of Victoria's biggest real estate empires, worth more than $500 million, four decades after their Italian family founded the dynasty.

source: Místní obyvatelé však tvrdí, že mobilní brigáda (indonéská paramilitaristická policie) začala střílet do davu a zabila jednoho člověka.
reference: But locals claim that a mobile brigade (Indonesian paramilitary police) opened fire on the crowd, killing one person.
translation: But locals say the mobile brigade (Indonesian paramilitary police) began shooting at the crowd, killing one.

source: Společnost Pearson propustí dalších 3000 zaměstnanců a snižuje dividenda ve snaze oživit obchod
reference: Pearson lays off 3,000 more workers and cuts dividend in bid to revive business
translation: Pearson cuts another 3,000 jobs, slashes dividend to revive business

source: Dixie tvrdil, že Sally a její ex přítel Lewis Sprotson se osudné noci hádali.
reference: Dixie claimed that Sally and her ex-boyfriend Lewis Sprotson had been arguing on the fateful night.
translation: Dixie claimed that Sally and her ex-boyfriend Lewis Sprotson were fighting on the fateful night.

source: „Realitní makléř v podstatě při vstupu do bytu spočítá odhadne jeho cenu na základě obytné plochy.“
reference: "The real estate agent basically calculates the price of the apartment on the basis of the living area."
translation: "In a rudimentary form, a real estate agent will walk in and do a calculation based on floor size."

source: Své první dny v politice pak Dědek korunoval návrhem na daňové zvýhodnění rodin se studovanými dětmi.
reference: His first days in politics were crowned with a proposal to tax families with children under study.
translation: Dědek's first days in politics were topped off with a proposal to give tax benefits to families with children who are studying.

source: „Běžela jsem k tělu, abych se přesvědčila, že je to opravdu on,“ řekla týdeníku TIME zasmušilým hlasem Yohanesová, která jako mnoho Indonésanů používá pouze jedno jméno.
reference: "I ran to the body to make sure it was really him," Yohanes, who like many Indonesians uses only one name, told TIME Weekly in a somber voice.
translation: "I ran to him and examined his body to make sure it was him," Yohanes, who like many Indonesians only goes by one name, told TIME somberly.

source: Majitel Penty Marek Dospiva spolu s dalšími kolegy za vodou Martinem Burdou a Antonínem Fryčem sponzoruje Robejškovy Realisty.
reference: The owner of Penta, Marek Dospiva, along with other colleagues across the water, Martin Burda and Antonin Fryc, sponsors Robezhka Realists.
translation: Along with other colleagues behind Martin Burda and Antonín Fryč, Penta owner Marek Dospiva sponsors Robejšek's Realisty.

source: Muž, kterého nikdy v životě neviděl, ho hned po otevření bez varování polil kyselinou se slovy: "To je pro tebe, kamaráde."
reference: The man he'd never seen before in his life poured acid over him right after opening without warning, saying, "That's for you, buddy."
translation: A man he had never seen in his life poured acid on him without warning as soon as he opened up, saying, "That's for you, friend."

source: Přivezl ho vládní speciál.
reference: A government special brought it in.
translation: He was picked up by a special government plane.

source: „Chceme toho n---a Rogera!“ zařval muž.
reference: "We want that n---a Roger!" the man yelled.
translation: "We want that n----r Roger!" the man barked.

source: Výše jmenované faktory jsou však pouze jedním projevem obecnější zdrženlivosti vůči cizincům.
reference: But the factors listed above are only one manifestation of a more general reticence toward outsiders.
translation: However, the above-mentioned factors are only one manifestation of more a general restraint in relation to foreigners.

source: Jachta, pojmenovaná jako Afalina, vyplula z Jižní Ameriky a policie ji po zadržení odtáhla do přístavu ve městě Nouméa, metropoli francouzského zámořského teritoria Nová Kaledonie v Tichém oceánu.
reference: The yacht, named as Afalina, left South America and was towed by police to a port in the city of Nouméa, the metropolis of the French overseas territory of New Caledonia in the Pacific Ocean, after being apprehended.
translation: The yacht, which was named Afalina, sailed from South America and the police dragged it to a port in Nouméa, a metropolis in the French overseas territory of New Caledonia in the Pacific Ocean.

source: Vytvářením a licencováním softwaru s konkrétním úmyslem měření povinností zaměstnanců umožňují startupy společnostem provádět rychlé hlasování, cílit na specifické týmy a demografické skupiny, dále nabízí naprostou anonymitu zaměstnanců a horkou linku pro podávání stížností, a v některých případech také dovolují informátorům obejít nadřízené a kontaktovat přímo ředitele.
reference: By creating and licensing software with the specific intent of measuring employees' responsibilities, startups allow companies to conduct quick voting, target specific teams and demographic groups, offer complete anonymity of employees and a hotline for complaints, and in some cases also allow informants to bypass supervisors and contact directors directly.
translation: By building and licensing software that has the specific purpose of measuring employee engagement, they allow companies to do snap polls, target specific teams and demographic groups, offer employees anonymity and complaint hotlines, and in some cases allow whistle-blowers to bypass C-suite executives and go straight to the board of directors.

translation: Since the last parliamentary elections, the Czech Republic has expanded its representation in Asia through the Consulate General in Irbil, Iraq and Chengdu, capital of Sichuan Province.

translation: In 2015, only two million Americans visited mainland China, while 1.8 million Americans went to Hong Kong, which accounts for less than three percent of China's gross domestic product and is home to less than one percent of its population.

reference: Englishman Eales will defend his championship for the first time, despite winning both the European Tour and the European Challenge Tour during his 32-year career.
translation: Englishman Eales is looking forward to defending a championship for the first time despite winning on both the European Tour and European Challenge Tour in his 32-year career.

source: V rámci výzkumu vědci zjistili přítomnost imunitních buněk podporujících toleranci těla v žaludku myší s konkrétní bakterií.
reference: As part of the research, researchers found the presence of body-tolerant immune cells in the stomachs of mice with a particular bacteria.
translation: In experiments it was found a kind of tolerance-promoting immune cell appears in mice that carry a specific bacterium in their guts.

source: Ústavní soudci však stížnost označili za neopodstatněnou, zjistila ČTK z databáze soudu.

translation: However, the Constitutional Judges found the complaint to be unjustified, as CTK learned from the court database.

source: Výsledky průzkumu ukázaly, že více než jeden z pěti cestujících do USA pronáší zakázané předměty na palubu letadla
reference: Survey results show that more than one in five passengers to the US carry prohibited items on board an aircraft
translation: More than 1 in 5 US travellers carry prohibited items onto aircraft, survey finds

source: Nyní je důležité, abychom testy zahájili co nejdříve v celé zemi a ochránili tak osoby, které jsou vystaveny HIV a společně tak ukončili šíření HIV ve společnosti.'
reference: It is now important that we start testing as soon as possible across the country to protect people who are exposed to HIV and, together, end the spread of HIV in society.'
translation: Now it is important that this trial is rolled out as quickly as possible across the country to protect individuals who are exposed to HIV and help take us one step closer to ending the spread of HIV in society.'

source: Nebude chybět La Quadrilla s irskými a skotskými tanci, bubenické jammování, hra na dudy a úžasné ohňové překvapení v podání Carpe Noctem.

translation: Don't miss La Quadrilla with Irish and Scottish dances, drum jamming, bagpipe playing and a terrific fire surprise presented by Carpe Nocte.

source: Ač se hodlá ucházet o hlasy voličů v dresu Starostů, nadále podporuje Andreje Babiše.

translation: Although he intends to run for election for the Starostové, he continues to support Andrej Babiš.

source: Deset kusů sladkých brambor stojí jen 10 000 indonéských rupií (75 centů).

translation: Ten pieces of nota cost only 10,000 Indonesian rupiah (75 cents).

source: Jedno ze zmíněných kritérií nicméně volá po veřejném oznámení výsledků vyšetřování WADA, které prošetřoval Richard McLaren, o údajném sponzorování dopingu ruských sportovců ze strany vlády.
reference: However, one of those criteria calls for a public announcement of the results of the WADA investigation, under investigation by Richard McLaren, into alleged government sponsorship of doping by Russian athletes.
translation: One of the criteria mentioned in the list, however, states that Russian anti-doping authorities must publically accept the reported outcomes of the WADA-sanctioned investigation by Canadian lawyer Richard McLaren on alleged state-sponsored doping in Russian sport.

source: V jednom expozice, ve druhém integrované WC s tekoucí vodou.

source: Francouzi nám do projektu Tajný život města povolili přeložit aplikaci do slovenštiny a češtiny.

source: NSH nabídne od září pacientům, jež jsou vystaveni vysokému riziku infekce HIV nový mocný nástroj, který je individuálně kontrolován a nepodléhá nutnosti přemlouvat partnera, což povede ke zlepšení kvality mnoha životů.
reference: From September, NSH will offer patients at high risk of HIV a powerful new tool that is individually controlled and not subject to partner coaxing, which will improve the quality of many lives.
translation: From September, people at high risk of HIV will have access via this NHS-funded trial in England to an empowering new tool that is truly individually controlled and not subject to negotiation with a partner, leading to the improvement of many, many lives.

source: Vládní speciál dopravil zraněného Róberta Žitňanského do Bratislavy ve středu po poledni.

translation: The government special plane brought the injured Róbert Žitňanský to Bratislava on Wednesday afternoon.

source: I relativně jednoduchý odšťavňovač ovoce, kde se prostě přidržel překrojený grep, vyžadoval asi deset obrázků.

translation: Even a relatively simple fruit juicer which just needed a grapefruit pressed down on it required about ten pictures.

source: Úřad zdůraznil, že riziko představuje pouze omezený počet typů vajec rozpoznatelný podle konkrétních čísel.

source: Program je většinou dělaný tak, že hrajete třeba čtyři zápasy venku a pak máte dva dny volno.

translation: The schedule is normally arranged so that you play around four away matches and then you get two days off.

source: Vzestup sexuálních robotů je alarmující hned z několika důvodů - mezi něž nepatří záměna za skutečné mezilidské vztahy. Znepokojující jsou spíše podřadné ženské charakterové rysy a násilné narážky - např. frigidní (čti vzdorující) Farrah.
reference: The rise of sex robots is alarming for several reasons - not including substitution for real interpersonal relationships. What is worrying are rather inferior female character traits and violent innuendo - such as the frigid (read defiant) Farrah.
translation: There are many disturbing aspects to the rise of sex robots - not least of which is the replacement of real, human relationships - but the subservient female traits, the rapey connotations of making a move on Frigid (read: resistant) Farrah, are the most concerning.

source: Kelly zaměstnancům oznámil, že musí osobně schválit všechny informace - ať už na papíře nebo mluvné slovo - protože prezident se může na základě správných informací lépe rozhodnout.“
reference: Kelly told the staff that he had to personally approve all information - whether on paper or spoken word - because the President could make a better decision based on the right information."
translation: Kelly told the staff that information needed to flow through him - whether on paper or in briefings - because the president would make better decisions if given good information."

source: Na konci července usmrtila bomba umístěná v automobilu alespoň 30 lidí v kábulské čtvrti Shia.

translation: At the end of July, a suicide car bomb killed at least 30 people in a mainly Shia district of Kabul.

source: Některé příběhy v knize využívají hrad jako odrazový můstek a noří se hlouběji do anglické historie, včetně příběhu s názvem The Labourer, který sleduje muže, jenž opustí nově budovaný hrad, aby se připojil k Anglickému povstání roku 1381.
reference: Some stories in the book use the castle as a springboard and delve deeper into English history, including a story called The Labourer, which follows a man who leaves a newly built castle to join the English Rebellion of 1381.
translation: Some of the stories in the collection use the castle as a jumping-off point to delve more broadly into English history, including The Labourer, which follows a man who leaves the newly built castle to join the 1381 Peasants' Revolt.

source: Děsivá, neustále ucpaná cesta na Benešov, dálnice D1 nebo D8.

source: V dubnu 1946 získali na základě rozhodnutí nejvyššího soudu obyvatelé černé pleti státu Georgia vůbec poprvé právo účastnit se voleb, které byly naplánovány na léto.
reference: In April 1946, a Supreme Court decision gave Georgia's black residents the right to participate for the first time ever in an election that had been scheduled for the summer.
translation: In April 1946, a Supreme Court ruling enabled black citizens in Georgia to cast ballots for the first time during the primary race later that summer.

reference: If Curry can make it through the cut, which will probably be set at two shots under par, he will become the first representative of another sport to do so on the Web.com Tour.
translation: If Curry is able to make the cut, which is likely to be around two under par, he will become the first representative of another sport to prove themselves on the Web.com Tour.

source: Není známo, jestli vedlejší produkty tryptofanu z bakterie L. reuteri způsobují vývoj buněk u lidí stejným způsobem jako u myší, ale defekty v genech související s tryptofanem byly zjištěny u lidí se zánětlivým onemocněním střev.
reference: It is not known if tryptophan by-products from L. reuteri cause cell development in humans in the same way as in mice, but defects in tryptophan-related genes have been found in people with inflammatory bowel disease.
translation: It is not known whether tryptophan byproducts from L. reuteri induce the cells to develop in people as they do in mice, but defects in genes related to tryptophan have been found in people with inflammatory bowel disease.

source: Nebo The Smuggler o pašerákovi z 18. století jménem Arthur Darrell, který údajně zinscenoval vlastní pohřeb, když naplnil rakev kameny (což se zjistilo až několik let poté po odkrytí rakve).
reference: Or The Smuggler, about an 18th-century smuggler named Arthur Darrell who allegedly staged his own funeral when he filled a coffin with stones (which wasn't discovered until years later after the coffin was uncovered).
translation: Or The Smuggler, which features 18th-century contrabander Arthur Darrell, who is thought to have staged his own funeral by filling a coffin with rocks (a discovery made years later when his coffin was unearthed).

source: ČSSD vede Lubomír Zaorálek, který koalici s ANO nevylučuje, v ODS se možná prosadí Václav Klaus ml., jenž také nebude proti.

source: Chce, aby Jokowi věděl, že obyvatelé Paniai - kromě toho, že žijí v neustálém strachu z loupeživé armády - se válí v chudobě, mizerném vzdělání a zdravotním systému.

translation: He wants Jokowi to know that the Paniai people, aside from living under the looming threat of a rapacious military, wallow in destitution, with paltry education and health services.

source: Návrh také předpokládá, že by se musela rozšířit působnost krajských vojenských velitelství, která by dohromady zaměstnala dalších 42 vojáků.

source: Hlavní role - houževnatého Gregora a idealistického Iosefa - hrají Florin Piersic Jr. a Corneliu Ulici, které nadabovali do anglického jazyka Channing Tatum (výkonný producent seriálu) a Joseph Gordon-Levitt.
reference: The lead roles - the tenacious Gregor and the idealistic Iosef - are played by Florin Piersic Jr. and Corneliu Ulici, who have been drummed into the English language by Channing Tatum (the show's executive producer) and Joseph Gordon-Levitt.
translation: The lead roles - hard-boiled Gregor and idealistic Iosef - are played by Florin Piersic Jr. and Corneliu Ulici, their dialogue dubbed in English by Channing Tatum (also an executive producer) and Joseph Gordon-Levitt.

source: „Byla jsem rozhněvaná a plakala jsem.“

translation: His death also has forced them to question their own assumptions about how best to do their jobs and stay alive.

source: Nárůst s velkou pravděpodobností zůstane na 0,3 % ve třetím kvartálu, ačkoliv ke konci roku by se měl dle vyjádření banky mírně zvýšit.

translation: Growth is likely to remain at 0.3% in the third quarter, although it will start to pick up slightly at the end of the year, according to the Bank.

source: Francouzský prezident Macron ohlásil redukci zákonodárného sboru o třetinu, přitom tam je na jednoho zákonodárce 57 tisíc Francouzů, zatímco u nás to vychází na 17 tisíc Čechů.
reference: President Macron of France has announced a reduction of the legislature by a third, while there are 57,000 Frenchmen per lawmaker, compared with 17,000 Czechs for us.
translation: The French President Macron announced that he was reducing the legislative board by a third, and there are 57,000 French people per one legislator, whereas here the ratio is 17,000 Czechs to one.

translation: The whole event was filmed for national television, but many recordings were also shared on the Internet.

source: Mluvčí univerzity a Somerville College uvedl v prohlášení zaslaném e-mailem: „Kontaktovala nás britská policie a jsme připraveni asistovat také americké policii.“

translation: A spokesperson for the university and Somerville College said in an emailed statement that, "We have been in contact with the police in the UK and are ready to help the US investigating authorities in any way they need."

source: "Já jsem nikdy nesnil malé cíle," řekl na tiskové konferenci.

source: „Je znepokojující, jaký nátlak je třeba vyvinout, abychom změnili myšlení odpovědných osob a ochránili vzduch, který dýcháme,“ řekla Lori Ann Burdová z Centra biologické diverzity.
reference: "It is disturbing the pressure that needs to be applied to change the minds of those responsible and protect the air we breathe," said Lori Ann Burd of the Center for Biological Diversity.
translation: "It's disturbing how much pressure it took to get this commonsense step from the guy in charge of protecting the air we breathe," said Lori Ann Burd of the Center for Biological Diversity.

source: Takové byly moje požadavky,“ řekla.

translation: The head of the IAAF's Task Force, Rune Andersen, said on Monday that Russia had yet to meet several of the criteria for reinstatement.

source: Počet příchozích však loni vzrostl jen o 3,8 procenta a zhruba 80 procent turistů do Číny přišlo z Hongkongu, Macaa a Tchaj-wanu.

source: Z 3,5 milionů obyvatel zdejší provincie se 83 % hlásí ke křesťanství, ale demografie se mění s přílivem muslimských imigrantů z indonéských ostrovů - Jávy, Bornea, Sumatry a Sulawesi.

translation: The province's 3.5 million population is 83% Christian, but the demographic is changing as Muslim economic migrants arrive from Indonesia's populous islands of Java, Borneo, Sumatra and Sulawesi.

source: Původně byl ale Maghrabi hned po zatčení odsouzen ke 100 ranám bičem, ale jeho čin vzbudil takové pobouření, že se soudce rozhodl pro trest smrti.

translation: Maghrabi was originally sentenced to 100 lashes when he was arrested, but his actions provoked such outrage that the judge decided to apply the death penalty.

source: Miluji návody k použití.

It was a mere introduction to the wide range of instructions from the film Witchhammer, including a specially commissioned bonfire on the knoll above Losinský castle.

source: V případě podezření na otravu je třeba opustit zamořenou místnost.
reference: If poisoning is suspected, leave the infested room.
translation: In case of suspected poisoning, you should leave the affected room.

source: Americký prezident Donald Trump v lednovém telefonátu mexickému prezidentovi Enriquemu Peňovi Nietovi pohrozil, že se s ním nesetká, pokud bude veřejně říkat, že jeho země nebude platit za stavbu zdi mezi USA a Mexikem.
reference: In a call to Mexican President Enrique Peña Nieto in January, US President Donald Trump threatened not to meet with him if he publicly said his country would not pay to build a wall between the US and Mexico.
translation: In a phone call to Mexican President Enrique Peña Nieto this January, American President Donald Trump threatened that he wouldn't meet him if he publicly stated that his country would not pay for the construction of a wall between the US and Mexico.

source: Poslanci hlasování o návrhu zákona minulý měsíc odložili, dokud ho nezanalyzuje smíšená parlamentní komise.
reference: MPs postponed the vote on the bill last month until it was analysed by a joint parliamentary commission.
translation: Members of parliament postponed the vote last month while the Joint Parliamentary Committee carried out an analysis.

source: V důsledku útoků armáda v posledních letech zatkla a svévolně zadržela tisíce obyvatel Paniai, to vše pod záminkou „zajištění národní svrchovanosti“.
reference: As a result of the attacks, the military has arrested and arbitrarily detained thousands of Paniaan residents in recent years, all under the pretext of "securing national sovereignty."
translation: In response, thousands of people in Paniai have been arrested and arbitrarily detained by the military in recent years, under the guise of "safeguarding national sovereignty."

source: „Jenom si nemyslím, že tehdy běloši říkali ‚n--r' takovým tónem.“
reference: "I just don't think white people said 'n-r' in that tone back then."
translation: "I just don't think white people back then said 'n---a.'"

source: Folayanová s tímto vyjádřením souhlasí a dodává, že „hnutí je ve skutečnosti podporováno černými ženami a velkou spoustou výstředních černých žen.“
reference: Folayan agrees with this statement, adding that "the movement is actually supported by black women and a great many eccentric black women."
translation: Folayan agreed noting that "the movement is really upheld by black women and a lot of queer black women."

source: Na tomto místě založila rodina společnost Westco Jeans, která se rozrostla do řetězce se 160 kamennými obchody.
reference: This is where the family founded Westco Jeans, which grew into a chain of 160 stone stores.
translation: There, the family founded Westco Jeans and grew it into a chain of 160 retail outlets.

source: Podle realitních expertů se na ceně projevil fakt, že spojení s prezidentem není dostatečné pro přilákání potenciálních kupujících.
reference: According to real estate experts, the price was influenced by the fact that the connection to the president was not sufficient to attract potential buyers.
translation: According to real estate experts, the price reflected the fact that the connection with the president is not enough to attract potential buyers.

source: S novou cenou se ale řadí na druhé místo.
reference: But with the new price, it ranks second.
translation: but now with the new price, it is in second place.

source: Jejich tvůrci je konstruují tak, aby byly příjemné na dotek a působily na první pohled jako opravdová žena.
reference: Their creators construct them to be pleasant to the touch and to appear at first glance like a real woman.
translation: Their creators want them to feel human to the touch, for them to mimic the movement of a real body.

source: V jedné chvíli postava najde na hromadě haraburdí Apple Powerbook, kolečkové brusle a „spoustu dalších věcí z roku 1991“.
reference: At one point, the character finds an Apple Powerbook, roller skates, and "a lot of other stuff from 1991" in a pile of junk.
translation: At one point a character rummages through an Apple Powerbook, some in-line skates and "a bunch of other things from 1991."

source: „Neobyčejné na postu kapitánky týmu je, že jsem byla zvolena ostatními členy týmu. Byla to pro mě velká čest, ale vědomí, že mě zvolili členové týmu je o to potěšující,“ dodala.
reference: "The extraordinary thing about being team captain is that I was elected by the other team members. It was a great honor, but knowing that I was elected by the team members is all the more gratifying," she added.
translation: "The special thing about being team captain is that it was voted for by the other members of the team, so that it was such a huge honour anyway but to know that your teammates have voted for you and chosen you made it extra-special for me," she added.

source: Po odchodu Trumpa postačí, aby byl následný republikánský kandidát alespoň normální, což bude nesmírné zlepšení.
reference: With Trump gone, it will be enough for the subsequent Republican nominee to be at least normal, an immense improvement.
translation: When Trump goes, the next Republican candidate will merely have to be sane to qualify as an immeasurable improvement.

source: Záznamy naznačují, že HMX-1 vyšetřuje možné porušení tohoto nařízení.
reference: Records indicate that HMX-1 is investigating a possible violation of this regulation.
translation: Records indicate that HMX-1 inquired about whether the event might violate the provision.

source: Co se týče útoku, Christopheros si je jistý, že si ho neznámý muž musel s někým splést.
reference: As for the attack, Christopheros is sure the unknown man must have mistaken him for someone else.
translation: In terms of the attack, Christopheros is convinced that the unknown man must have confused him with someone else.

source: Podle studie RAND z roku 2015 náhrady výdajů DoD nezahrnují náklad na personál, avšak zahrnují cenu paliva, údržbu a smluvní náklady.
reference: According to the 2015 RAND study, refunds for DoD expenses do not include personnel costs, but do include fuel, maintenance and contracted costs.
translation: According to a 2015 RAND study, DoD reimbursement rates do not include the cost of personnel, but do account for fuel, maintenance, and contracting costs.

source: Kritik Putina dostal mastnou pokutu.
reference: A critic of Putin has been slapped with a hefty fine.
translation: A critic of Putin received a hefty fine.

source: A nejhorší je, že s tím nemůžete vůbec nic udělat.
reference: And the worst part is there's absolutely nothing you can do about it.
translation: And the worst thing is that you can't do anything about it at all.

source: Nechte se přesvědčit v Brně.
reference: Be convinced in Brno.
translation: Let yourself be convinced in Brno.

source: Rodiny obětí střelby v Paniai uvítali jeho tvrzení s nedůvěrou.
reference: The families of the victims of the Paniai shooting greeted his claim with incredulity.
translation: Families of the Paniai victims greeted such claims with grim incredulity.

source: Dokonce souhlasil s tím, aby tu moravskoslezskou vedl hejtman a stínový ministr školství ANO Ivo Vondrák.
reference: He even agreed to have the Moravian-Silesian leader and the shadow education minister YES, Ivo Vondrák.
translation: He even agreed to allow "hejtman" (marshall) and Shadow Education Minister Ivo Vondrák lead the Moravian-Silesian region.

source: Současné hnutí protestující proti nizozemským pravidlům rychle obrátilo svůj hněv proti jakartské vládě, která ovládala celý region s výjimkou zahraničních novinářů nebo dohlížitelů civilních práv.
reference: The current movement protesting the Dutch rules quickly turned its ire on the Jakarta government, which controlled the entire region except for foreign journalists or civil rights supervisors.
translation: An existing movement agitating for independence against Dutch rule swiftly turned its ire against the Jakarta government, which maintains tight control over the region, barring foreign journalists or rights monitors.

source: A přesně to také jsou - skuteční lidé, kteří hovoří ke svým zvoleným vůdcům; učitel, podnikatel a pastor, žádní trolové.
reference: And that's exactly what they are - real people talking to their elected leaders; a teacher, a businessman and a pastor, no trolls.
translation: And they're just that - real people talking to their elected leaders: a teacher, a business owner and a pastor, not trolls.

source: V čirém zoufalství k tomu došlo a poté byl krok 1-3 stejně snadný a rychlý, jako u strany pravé.
reference: In sheer desperation it happened, and after that step 1-3 was as easy and quick as the right side.
translation: In utter despair, I tried it and then steps 1-3 were as easy and fast as on the right side.

source: Ten nával energie cítíte i před obrazovku.“
reference: You can feel the rush of energy in front of the screen."
translation: You can feel her energy through the screen."

source: Velmi znepokojující je ovšem fakt, že mnoho robotů má vlastní „osobnost“, která by zahanbila i Stepfordskou paničku.
reference: Very disturbing, however, is the fact that many robots have their own "personality" that would put even the Stepford Wife to shame.
translation: But it gets even more disturbing, with many of the robots possessing "personalities" that would make a Stepford Wife look progressive.

source: Bude to skvělý zápas.“
reference: It's going to be a great game."
translation: It will be a great fight."

source: Za druhé, co je špatného na výhradě svědomí?
reference: Second, what's wrong with a conscience reservation?
translation: Secondly, what's wrong with conscientious objection?

source: Není sporu o tom, že je nutné si tyto události neustále připomínat.
reference: There is no disputing the need to be constantly reminded of these events.
translation: There is no question about the need to remember these events constantly.

source: Socha měla vyjadřovat spojení francouzské a americké republikánské vlády tím, že by reprezentovala klasické téma, tedy ženské ztělesnění svobody.
reference: The statue was intended to convey the connection between the French and American Republican governments by representing a classic theme, the female embodiment of freedom.
translation: The sculpture was intended to mark the connections between French and American republicanism by representing in a well-worn classical trope, the female embodiment of Liberty.

source: Navzdory hrozbám a zastrašování rodiny obětí paniaiské střelby pokračují v posledním symbolickém aktu vzdoru: pohřbívají těla obětí na pozemku naproti policejní a armádní stanici.
reference: Despite the threats and intimidation, the families of the victims of the Panai shooting continue their latest symbolic act of defiance: burying the bodies of the victims on land opposite a police and army station.
translation: Despite the threats and intimidation, families of the Paniai shooting victims carried out one last symbolic act of defiance: burying one victim's body on land just opposite the police and military station.

source: "Je to ošetřovatelsky náročnější, ale ideální by bylo pacienta občas odkrýt a nechat kůži vyvětrat," uvedla lékařka.
reference: "It's more nursing-intensive, but the ideal thing would be to uncover the patient occasionally and let the skin air out," the doctor said.
translation: "It's more demanding on the nursing staff, but the ideal would be to uncover the patient occasionally and let the skin breathe," the doctor explained.

source: Na místo, které přibližně popsala, vyrazilo několik policejních hlídek, ale najít mladou ženu nebylo vůbec snadné.
reference: Several police patrols rushed to the scene she approximately described, but finding the young woman was anything but easy.
translation: Several police patrols went to the site she described, but finding the young woman was no easy task.

source: V pondělí byl vydán zatykač za vraždu prvního stupně na muže jménem Wyndham Lathem (42) a Andrew Warren (56) za jejich údajnou spoluúčast na smrti Trentona H. Jamese Cornell-Duranleaua, uvádí soudní spis Cook County.
reference: A warrant was issued Monday for the first-degree murder of a man named Wyndham Lathem (42) and Andrew Warren (56) for their alleged complicity in the death of Trenton H. James Cornell-Duranleau, the Cook County court filing states.
translation: On Monday, first-degree murder warrants without bail were issued for Wyndham Lathem, 42, and Andrew Warren, 56, for their alleged involvement in the death of Trenton H. James Cornell-Duranleau, Cook County court records show.

source: Ale vidí v tom někdo systém, řád či pravidla?
reference: But does anyone see a system, an order, or rules?
translation: But can anyone see a system, order or rule?

source: Dnes se však pod náporem nedávných událostí schází hlavně kvůli vlastnímu bezpečí.
reference: Today, however, under the strain of recent events, they gather mainly for their own safety.
translation: But on this day, in the shadow of their own tragedy, they've come together to talk about security.

source: Vedle standardního výcviku, při kterém měli odhalovat v okolí jezera ostré vzorky výbušnin a hledat ztraceného figuranta, muselo všech 12 zvířat nastoupit do vrtulníku a přeletět nad jezerem.
reference: In addition to standard training to detect sharp samples of explosives around the lake and search for the missing figurehead, all 12 animals had to board a helicopter and fly over the lake.
translation: In addition to the standard training, which involves being exposed to specimens of explosives around the lake and looking for a lost figurine, all 12 animals had to board the helicopter and fly over the lake.

source: Následné testy nás přivedou o krok blíž k plnému porozumění benefitů PrEP.
reference: Subsequent tests will bring us one step closer to a full understanding of the benefits of PrEP.
translation: This trial will take us one step closer to fully understanding the benefits of PrEP.

source: Měl za to, že za dveřmi je nejspíš kurýr, který měl doručit ten den vánoční dárky pro rodinu.
reference: He figured there was probably a courier at the door to deliver Christmas gifts to the family that day.
translation: He thought that the person at the door was probably the courier who was supposed to deliver the Christmas gifts for the family that day.

source: A co tichá podpora komunistů vaší menšinové vládě?
reference: What about the tacit support of the Communists for your minority government?
translation: And what about having the silent support of the Communists for your minority government?

source: V sankcích proti Rusku prezident Trump pouze dotahuje to, co nachystal již prezident Obama, jen tomu dal prováděcí razítko.
reference: In sanctions against Russia, President Trump is merely putting the finishing touches on what President Obama has already prepared, only to put an implementing stamp on it.
translation: With the sanctions against Russia, President Trump is only following through on what President Obama put into place. He is simply the one to give them the official stamp.

source: To jsem byl před čtyřmi lety, když jsem odsud odcházel a nevěděl, co bude.
reference: That was four years ago when I walked out of here not knowing what was coming.
translation: I was four years ago, when I went away and didn't know how it would be.

source: Většina z tisíců vražd, ke kterým dochází každý rok, je spojována s drogovým obchodem a organizovaným zločinem. Vrahové novinářů se tak velmi výjimečně dostávají k soudu.
reference: Most of the thousands of murders that occur every year are associated with drug trafficking and organized crime, so journalist killers very rarely go to trial.
translation: As with most of the thousands of murders tied to drug trafficking and organized crime each year, the killers of journalists are rarely brought to justice.

source: Na cesty si musejí získat buď federální granty, je ale absurdní, aby federální vláda financovala cesty občanů ze státu A do státu B, anebo soukromý sponzoring.
reference: They have to get either federal grants for travel, but it is absurd for the federal government to fund travel by citizens from State A to State B, or private sponsorship.
translation: To fund the trips, they must either get federal grants, although it is absurd for the federal government to finance the travels of citizens from State A to State B, or else private sponsorship.

source: Představitelé skotské atletiky si myslí, že to má co do činění s tím, co udělali.
reference: Scottish athletics officials think it has something to do with what they've done.
translation: Scottish Athletics think it's something to do with what they've done.

source: Francouzské námořnictvo zadrželo v Tichomoří jachtu vezoucí 1,46 tuny kokainu v hodnotě zhruba 256 milionů dolarů.
reference: The French Navy intercepted a yacht in the Pacific carrying 1.46 tons of cocaine worth about $256 million.
translation: The French Navy seized a yacht in the Pacific carrying 1.46 tonnes of cocaine, worth about $256 million.

source: Tohoto, u nás poměrně nového zpěváka, jste už možná zaregistrovali v červnu tohoto roku, kdy tento dosud u nás téměř neznámý zpěvák uspořádal na české poměry monstrózní akci, na které hostil takové přední osobnosti jako je mistr Karel Gott, Lucie Bílá, Simona Krainová a řada dalších, a akci nemoderoval nikdo jiný, než Leoš Mareš.
reference: You may have already noticed this, a relatively new singer for us, in June of this year, when this hitherto unknown singer organised a monstrous event in the Czech Republic, hosting such leading figures as Master Karel Gott, Lucie Bílá, Simona Krain and many others, and the event was hosted by none other than Leoš Mareš.
translation: The singer is relatively new here, but you may have heard about him in June of this year, when he a huge event on Czech soil, hosted by such prominent personalities as Karel Gott, Lucie Bílá, Simona Krainová and a number of others, moderated by none other than Leoš Mareš.

source: Podle nové legislativní úpravy by mělo přestat být trestné umělé přerušení těhotenství ve třech případech: pokud bude ohrožen život ženy, jestliže plod nebude mít naději na přežití, anebo pokud těhotenství vzniklo ze znásilnění.
reference: Under the new legislation, abortion should cease to be punishable in three cases: if a woman's life is at risk, if the foetus has no hope of survival, or if the pregnancy arose from rape.
translation: According to the new legislation, pregnancies can be ended in three cases: if the woman's life will be endangered, if the foetus has no hope of survival or if the pregnancy is the result of rape.

source: Posuzování biologického věku je v jistém smyslu velmi nejisté.
reference: In a sense, judging biological age is highly uncertain.
translation: Judging biological age in this way is very uncertain.

source: Na druhé straně místnosti sedí Tyrone Brooks v soudní síni. Vychutnává si večeři a mluví přitom o občanských právech.
reference: Across the room, Tyrone Brooks is sitting in a courtroom, enjoying his dinner while talking about civil rights.
translation: Across the room, Tyrone Brooks holds court at his table, eating and reminiscing about civil rights.

source: "Babiš není ostřílený řečník a nevládne líbivou rétorikou politických hadů," psal o něm před volbami 2013.
reference: "Babiš is not a seasoned orator and does not rule by the pleasing rhetoric of political snakes," he wrote of him before the 2013 election.
translation: "Babiš is not a seasoned speaker and cannot handle the lively rhetoric of political snakes," he wrote about him before the 2013 elections.

source: Herci uklízejí lano a stírají si slzy.
reference: The actors are cleaning the rope and wiping away tears.
translation: The actors throw off the lynching rope and wipe away tears.

source: Některé pobočky se rozhodly ukončit činnost, jako např. noviny El Norte se sídlem u severních hranic státu Chihuahua v odpověď na březnovou vraždu zpravodajky Miroslavy Breachové.
reference: Some branches have decided to close down, such as the El Norte newspaper, based near the northern borders of Chihuahua state, in response to the murder of the rapporteur Miroslava Breach in March.
translation: Some outlets have opted to close, such as the newspaper El Norte, in the northern border state of Chihuahua, after the killing of correspondent Miroslava Breach in March.

source: Pak existují různorodost, rozmanitost, diverzita.
reference: Then there is diversity, diversity, diversity.
translation: Then there are variety, multiplicity and diversity.

source: Kdyby se něco takového stalo, zbavíme se kohokoli, je úplně jedno, kdo by to byl.
reference: If something like this happened, we'd get rid of anyone, it doesn't matter who they were.
translation: If anything like that were to happen, we would get rid of the relevant people, no matter who they were.

source: U Mostu cvičili jak dospělí vycvičení psi, tak ti, kteří výcvikem teprve procházejí.
reference: At the Bridge, both adult trained dogs and those in training were trained.
translation: At Most, previously educated dogs were trained like adults, and those who are not yet trained just passed by.

source: Turisté zaparkovali 20 karavanů na poli u vzkvétající ulice ve městě Solihull, které se přezdívá ‚milionářská čtvrť'.
reference: The tourists parked 20 caravans in a field off a thriving street in Solihull, which has been dubbed the "millionaire's district."
translation: The travellers have parked their 20 caravans in a field outside a prosperous street of Solihull dubbed 'millionaire's row'.

source: To, co zaměstnanci guvernéra nazvali „soustředěným spamovým úrokem“ by jiní nejspíš nazvali „obhajobou“.
reference: What the governor's staff called "concentrated spam interest," others would probably call "advocacy."
translation: What the governor's staff called a "concentrated spam attack" others would probably call "advocacy."

source: Násilná smrt malé dívky zasáhla celou zemi, která čelí hrozbě občanské války.
reference: The violent death of a little girl has affected an entire country facing the threat of civil war.
translation: The young girl's violent death affected the entire country, which is currently facing the threat of civil war.

source: „V brzké budoucnosti dokončíme plán WADA“ - místopředseda ruské vlády Mutko
reference: 'We will finalise WADA plan in the near future' - Russian Deputy Prime Minister Mutko
translation: "We'll complete WADA roadmap in near future" - Russian Deputy PM Mutko

source: „Zaujal mne otisk palce na dopise, který napsal dvojitý agent v 70. letech, jenž pracoval pro Jakobity,“ řekl.
reference: "I was intrigued by the thumbprint on a letter written by a double agent in the '70s who worked for the Jacobites," he said.
translation: "I welled up at just the thumbprint on the side of a letter, written by a double agent in the 1700s who was working for the Jacobites," he says.

source: S negativním či odmítavým postojem se nesetkává.
reference: There is no negative or negative attitude.
translation: She isn't faced with a positive or negative attitude.

source: Přesto, že v roce 2010 byla zřízena zvláštní federální prokuratura s cílem řešit případy novinářů, dosud podle vyjádření Výboru na ochranu novinářů zažalovala dva podezřelé.
reference: Even though a special federal prosecutor was established in 2010 to handle journalists' cases, it has so far sued two suspects, according to the Committee to Protect Journalists.
translation: Although a special federal prosecutor's office was established in 2010 to handle the journalists' cases, it has only prosecuted two, according to the Committee to Protect Journalists.

source: "Vařit podle Ládi Hrušky nepřichází v úvahu ani doma, protože domů si přece nepustím gastropunk," má jasno šéf.
reference: "Cooking according to Ládi Hruška is not an option at home either, because I won't let my gastropunk go home," the boss is clear.
translation: "Cooking according to Láďa Hruška isn't even considered at home, because I don't let gastropunks in my home," the chef said clearly.

source: Je to stejné jako se zraněním.
reference: It's the same with an injury.
translation: It's the same as with injuries.

source: Jednou z nich je další ročník Večera pro klášter Chotěšov tuto sobotu pátého srpna, kde vystoupí mj. Vladimír Mišík, Ivan Hlas, uvidíte šermířská vystoupení a podíváte se na místa nádherné rozlehlé stavby, která jsou obvykle nepřístupná.
reference: One of them is another edition of Evening for the Chotěšov Monastery this Saturday, the fifth of August, featuring, among others, Vladimir Misek, Ivan Voice, you will see fencing performances and look at the sites of a beautiful sprawling structure that is usually inaccessible.
translation: One of them is the annual dinner for the Chotěšov Monastery, which will take place on Saturday 5 August. Vladimír Mišík amd Ivan Hlas will perform, you can see fencing duels and look at the amazing huge buildings, which are usually inaccessible.

source: „Byl zabit člen naší rodiny,“ řekl Yacobus se sklopenou hlavou.
reference: "A member of our family was killed," Yacobus said, his head bowed.
translation: "A member of our family has been killed," says Yacobus, head bowed.

source: Dnes má Christopheros za sebou dvanáct operací, které zdaleka nejsou poslední.
reference: Today, Christopheros has had twelve surgeries that are far from his last.
translation: At this point, Christopheros has undergone twelve operations and is still far away from the last.

source: Emma Lazarus, stejně jako její přátelé, kteří po její smrti usilovali o zasazení plakety s básní na podstavec sochy, dost dobře věděli, že se pouští do vysoké politické hry.
reference: Emma Lazarus, like her friends who, after her death, had sought to place a plaque with a poem on the base of the statue, knew full well that she was engaging in a high-stakes political game.
translation: Lazarus - and her friends who campaigned to place her words at the base after her death - knew very well that they were engaging in a highly political act.

source: Zveřejnil fotografii Brownova těla, kterak leží bezvládně na ulici, odkud jej nikdo neodvezl ani po čtyřech hodinách.
reference: He posted a photograph of Brown's body lying limp in the street, where it had not been taken four hours later.
translation: He posted a picture of Brown's lifeless body stretched out in the street, where it would stay for four hours.

source: Což také dokázali na tiskové konferenci TV Prima, kde se po delší době setkali.
reference: Which they did at TV Prime's press conference, where they met after an extended period of time.
translation: They proved this at a press conference at TV Prima, where they met after a long time.

source: Horké letní dny úplně lákají k tomu, vzít si na sebe jen to nejnutnější, co zakryje ty nejintimnější partie.
